HYaOn6J52RwVKT0f0sGU.transcription: Umurwayi w'umusaza uryamye ku gitanda cyo kwa muganga n'umuganga urimo kumuganiriza, uwo murwayi barimo kumupima umuvuduko w'amaraso, ku ruhande rwe hari ibyuma byo kwa muganga.

iVSThKTxcrF2rbKI8yz8.transcription: Umuntu uhagaze wambaye uturindantoki dusa ubururu afite akuma kariho amenyo atandukanye y'insimburangingo, imbere ye haryamye umugabo wambaye agapira k'umukara wikoze ku ryinyo rye, ubona ko yaje guhinduza iryinyo.

3O4sRSDTSRvW6xxxeaCE.transcription: Agacupa k'umuhondo, gafite amagambo yanditseho asa umutuku, n'umupfundikizo w'umutuku, gateretse hagati mu kimera cy'igikakarubamba.

aQGjSprJRY4SmCINnaHk.transcription: Imiti ya kinyarwanda, yateguwe neza muri rusange ikarangizwa igashyirwa ku isoko aho iba yateguwe mu bimera ndetse n'ibyatsi bitandukanye biba byahurijwe hamwe n'abavuzi gakondo, bagakoramo imiti myinshi itandukanye ivura indwara zitandukanye, igashyirwa ku isoko, igafasha abantu mu kwivura indwara zitandukanye.

AaZWLbEdI6th3oJfBSNa.transcription: Inyubako iteye irangi ry'umuhondo ariko inariho ibyapa bitandukanye bigaragaza ko ari inzu igurisha imiti n'ibindi bintu byifashishwa mu buzima bwa buri munsi, imbere yayo haparitse imodoka, imwe iri mu  ibara ry'umweru n'indi iri mu ibara ry'umuhondo.

VyImC4xqjoQRHTw7FXDG.transcription: Igihuru, cyiganjemo amoko y'ibyatsi atandukanye, gusa amenshi muri yo ahuriye ku  ibara ry'icyatsi, ndetse haragaragaramo n'imirasire y'izuba iri ku byatsi birebire kurusha ibindi.

Gyhh3n3yVaWNT6k9N1Xi.transcription: Agacupa k'ibara ry'umweru kari ahantu hari ibara ry'umukara kakaba kariho akapa kanditseho amagambo mu ibara ry'umutuku ndetse n'ubururu kakaba karimo umuti gakondo ukomoka ku bimera, wifashishwa mu kuvura indwara zigiye zitandukanye.

hoKXIgBWv6PXdmYFjJmb.transcription: Kimwe mu cyumba kiriri mu nyubako iberamo ubuvuzi harimo mudasobwa ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho byifashishwa, hari gutangwa serivisi z'ubuvuzi, hari ibyapa kandi bigiye byanditse ku madirisha kugira ngo bibashe kwerekana ndetse no kuyobora abaje babagana.

JNdRtBBrVXDNmcQ8Brxn.transcription: Abagore babiri bambaye imyenda iri mu mabara atandukanye bateruye umufuka bahereza umugabo wambaye imyenda iri mu mabara atandukanye ahagaze hejuru yindi mifuka.

ktBQeCAcir8Cbg8BjW4B.transcription: Umugabo bigaragara yuko akuze, wambaye umupira umwegereye, uri kumwe n'umugore w'inzobe, nawe bigaragara yuko akuze, ufite imisatsi y'imvi y'umweru, bigaragara ko bari ahantu heza, bishimye basa nk'abari gukora, imyitozo ngororamubiri.

upMDO3rLbDBzkjFz4319.transcription: Umuntu wita ku isuku yo mu kanwa arangwa no guhora aseka kandi afite amenyo meza y'umweru, ikindi bimurinda indwara zirimo nk'ifumbi, kuvunguka kw'amenyo kugira impumuro mbi mu kanwa no kuba yarwara nka kanseri y'iryinyo cyangwa se izindi ndwara. Tugomba kwita ku menyo dukoresheje umuti wabugenewe n'uburoso.

4MNUAVWZ2TAqZvUFUHCe.transcription: Ivomero rusange ryabugenewe rikoreshwa n'abaturage benshi mu rwego rwo kwimakaza isuku y'amazi meza hari umukobwa ubona waje kuvoma ndetse n'abana bato ubona abari kumwe bose bafite ibivomesho baje kuvoma kuri iryo  vomero.

OjWYuGkcD2CJTnwk53th.transcription: Isoko rigezweho risakaye ririmo abaguzi ndetse n'abacuruzi benshi, harimo ibicuruzwa byinshi bitandukanye, imboga n'imbuto kandi hakabamo abagore benshi kuruta abagabo.

pdBnOrhrC0XtxUGXrDfZ.transcription: Umugabo wambaye itaburiya y'ubururu afite mu kuboko kwe kw'iburyo urupapuro runini rushushanyijeho abana babiri uw’umuhungu n’umukobwa inyuma ye hari umugore wambaye agashati umweru ukenyeye igitenge, inyuma yabo kandi ari urukuta rwubakishije amabuye ruteye irangi ry'umutuku n'umukara.

sIEoTZOTttsG2DLqgN9D.transcription: Ni ahantu mu nyubako hari abantu benshi bahuriye ahantu hamwe bagizwe n'abakobwa benshi bafite amashusho mu ntoki  agaragaza ibintu runaka, bose bambaye imyenda isa hejuru hasi bakaba bambaye imyenda igiye itandukanye.

jaeic0vf5E7DJIK96E2o.transcription: Abantu benshi bateraniye ahantu, aho bari kwiyandika, kuri lisite zigiye zitandukanye, imbere yabo hari abantu babiri bari kubafasha, bakagenda babandika umwe kuri umwe.

zVVm0wn5WSa2s11fxegp.transcription: Abagore bateze amatwi bumva ikiganiro bari guhabwa n'umugore, imbere yabo hari inyanya inyuma yabo hari imbuto, bambaye ibitenge biteze n'ibitambaro mu mutwe.

PSFSLkarihXiwzRfbAgq.transcription: Umuntu wicaye wambaye imyenda y'ubururu ndetse n'uturindantoki tw'umweru, afashe ku cyuma gifashweho n'undi mugabo wambaye agapira k'umweru n'ikabutura na we uri kwiga kugendera muri ako kuma, inyuma yabo hari utundi dukoresho nk'icyuma gitanga umuyaga mu nzu.

xboDUc9BdLO4KsRx4gmG.transcription: Imiti myinshi cyane itandukanye ya gakondo yifashishwa mu buvuzi bwa gakondo harimo; udupa tw'umweru utw'icyatsi ndetse n'utundi tw'umuhondo tuyidushushanyijeho ibikakarubamba.

GIrTdggS0RvdESydreKs.transcription: Indwara zitandukanye zirimo agahinda gakabije, kugaragaza amarangamutima wivuye inyuma, ndetse no kwangirika kw'imikorere y'ubwonko, zose zivurwa hifashishijwe kuganirizwa.

0EFuMvbDwyxR9xjbyWyr.transcription: Abantu bagera kuri batandatu bateganye harimo abagabo batatu bambaye amakote, n'abagore babiri bambaye bitandukanye, umwe wa bambaye ikanzu y'umuhondo, undi wambaye agakanzu karimo uturabo, undi wambaye ishati y'umweru n'agapantaro k'umukara, inyuma yabo hari icyapa kinini kiriho ikirangantego kiranga repubulika y'u Rwanda na minisiteri y'ubuzima.

QRrbOlm3URPw17i1NB3f.transcription: Umukecuru ugeze mu gihe cy'imyaka y'izabukuru, yicaye hasi ahantu hari ibishingwe, imbere ye hari amashyiga, atetseho agasafuriya gapfundikije kandi. Icyori gukora we, ari kujya acana, yenyegeza wa muriro.

gNKslJRDNf9OmWP2jxKw.transcription: Abaturage bagiye batandukanye bari ku ivomero rusange, hakaba hari umu mama wambaye imyenda y'ibitenge ndetse n'akana kari kuvoma gafite ijerekani y'umuhondo n'abandi benshi bari inyuma bigaragara ko bashungereye.

WOeSOuwxMi8AbMvnVXZ5.transcription: Inzu ifite amakositara ndetse munsi yayo hari idirishya rifite ibara ry'icyatsi ndetse n'ibirahure; iruhande rw'idirishya hari icyapa cyometse ku gikuta; hejuru hari itara ndetse mu ibaraza ry'iyo nzu, hari umuntu uhahagaze wambaye itaburiya ifite ibara ry'umweru; imbere yaho hari ibyatsi.

XJZcTpcqAXb3XxBgJlDW.transcription: Amavomo agenda yubakwa hirya no hino kugira ngo ubuzima bw'abaturage burusheho kugenda neza kandi n'umuntu yaba adafite umwana atuma, akaba yajya kuyizanira kuko aba yarayegerejwe.

w2Zcy1WzTwVkSD1RmDF7.transcription: Mu Rwanda tugira ibitaro bito tukagira n'ibitaro bikuru kimwe mu bitaro bikuru kandi bizwi mu Rwanda ndetse no ku rwego mpuzamahanga twavuga ibiherereye i Kigali byitiriwe Umwami Fayisari.

Cy06yFi5cZM8gT2rCuMf.transcription: Ibimera bitandukanye byahigiwe hamwe bikorwamo imiti gakondo, harimo igikakarubamba n'ibindi bimera bikaba, byifashishwa havurwa indwara zitandukanye haba indwara zo mu nda, ndetse n'indwara z'uruhu kugira ngo uzirwaye yitabweho.

UBf3T1LPYxz1vD6C9i0o.transcription: Igikapu kinini cyane kiri mu ibara ry'umutuku, kirimo ibikoresho bitandukanye byifashishwa kwa muganga, harimo imakasi, ipombo ndetse n'ibindi byifashishwa mu gupfuka ahakomeretse.

Wzt0gyKpiZir3LKfVSmR.transcription: Abaganga bari gusobanurira abantu ibyerekeranye n'imiti ndetse barambitse ibikoresho bari gukoresha ku meza aho bari kubabwira uko bigenda bikora harimo umuzungu ndetse n'abandi birarabura.

2mlwzzvKbMixHH9DP1xp.transcription: Abagore babiri bambaye ibitenge, umwe wambaye isengeri y'umweru, undi wambaye agapira k'amaboko magufi, barimo baravomera amazi mugenzi, wabo uri koza indobo, ayogereza mu kibase. Hirya hari igiti.

xDenGnl9E32a2PrUSbfB.transcription: Abantu babiri, umurwayi w'umugabo ndetse n'umuganga w'umugore wambaye imyenda yabugenewe, umuganga arimo kwigisha umurwayi gutambuka kugira ngo arebe ko yakize.

eq3S1IW4uIeGAEJtAPoD.transcription: Inyubako nziza cyane y'ivuriro n'imbere turabonamo umuntu wicaye mu kagare k'abafite ubumuga ndetse hari umukobwa uri kumufasha. Hari abaganga bicayemo bari kugenda bafasha abarwayi babaha serivisi bari kubasaba, imbere yabo hateretse amacupa y'amazi.

BAVzl5vhqfUOn9aoihaS.transcription: Umwana uri gukaraba intoki ku ivomo rusange. Tugirwa inama yo gukaraba intoki kenshi gashoboka kugira ngo twirinde indwara ziterwa n'umwanda. Gukaraba intoki tugomba kubigira umuco, igihe tuvuye mu bwiherero ndetse n'igihe tumaze gukora ibintu byanduza ibiganza byacu, tugomba gukaraba intoki n'amazi meza ndetse n'isabune.

Z7092GPqBf0IGsQtiRjz.transcription: Igishushanyo mbonera cy'imikorere yo mu bitaro, hari ahabanza n'ahakurikira, kigizwe n'ibice bitatu biri kwerekanwa by'imikorere y'ibitaro.

BWl155vGgIDWFgYXniBu.transcription: Mu cyumba cyo kwa muganga umurwayi barimo baramubaga banamudoda, hari indwara umuntu agira bikaba ngombwa ko bamubaga, gusa abantu benshi barabitinya  kuko baba bakeka ko bashobora kuhatakariza ubuzima ariko abaganga baba barabyigiye babikora neza.

bicZqrnZ7On2w46gNE3b.transcription: Icyumba cy'inama harimo abantu benshi batandukanye, hari abantu batatu bicaye imbere y'abandi, harimo n'umuzungu umwe, inyuma yabo hari icyapa cya RBC, ikigo cyita ku buzima bw'abantu mu Rwanda.

UJuB7eQh3vaDcWkbp1NK.transcription: Aya ni amazu menshi kandi manini y'ibitaro, asize amabara agiye atandukanye yaba umweru n'umuhondo, akikijwe n'ubusitani bwiza burimo ibiti birebire bitanga umuyaga n'amahumbezi.

zPLPnxMJhRj1QYFxL8ls.transcription: Umugabo ukuze wicaye ku ntebe agiye kwa muganga, yambaye ipantaro, ishati y'umutuku, arimo araseka anezerewe uburyo bari kumusuzuma indwara afite, umukobwa mutoya w'umuganga wambaye imyenda y'ubururu.

4O8kdGdS3ZnKiSXFa6kh.transcription: Ubwoko bw'igikoresho cyifashishwa bavura cyane cyane imvune umuntu agirira mu myitozo ngororamubiri, yaba arimo arakina umupira cyangwa se ahuye n'ikindi kibazo gitunguranye, akaba ari igikoresho bamuzirikaho gikoranye n'umuti kandi cyizewe.

Khheqo938QyKm2xa4Gc1.transcription: Umubyeyi wicaye ku buriri buri hasi ari kureba umwana we agaseka, imbere ye hari akana gatoya kambaye agakanzu kari kureba imbere kari guseka kishimye.

P6O5ROlPCfL5Q7wlcLOr.transcription: Icyumba cyo kwa muganga kirimo ibikoresho bigiye bitandukanye byifashishwa n'abaganga kugira ngo bite ku ubuzima bw'abarwayi harimo ibitanda byiza biriho matela.

AZGLvoFCvbBp3u2ndStd.transcription: Umwana wambaye umupira w'umuhondo n'ikabutura y'umukara, afite akajerekani k'umweru, bari kuvoma amazi ava mu iriba, inyuma ye hari abandi bantu benshi batagaragara neza ndetse n'inyubako.

3RbUFUf3JXrYt4NANf4S.transcription: Umugabo ubona wicaye wenyine, wambaye imyenda isa nabi, bigaragara ko afite ikibazo cyo mu mutwe. Hari kandi n'abandi bamama ubona bicaye ku ntebe imwe, bari kumwitegereza bisa nkaho bashaka kumufasha kugira ngo abashe kugira ubuzima bwiza.

n8ADFy0xMtrWB3lrriZH.transcription: Icyatsi gisa neza gifite utubuto tw'amabara atandukanye, harimo umuhondo n'utundi tw'umutuku kandi cyo gifite amababi y'icyatsi.

SpxXstXec7I3vV2G728z.transcription: Abana benshi b'abanyeshuri bugamye ku nyubako ya  robine bareba imbere n'abandi bareba hasi, umwe muri bo ari kuvomera amazi mu kiganza areba imbere, inyuma yabo hari ishyamba rya kimeza ryakuze.

zYSSh0cDLjystrpO4wNn.transcription: Abakobwa cyane cyane abakuze, mushishikarizwa kuba mwakwitabira ibikorwa ngororamubiri, buri munsi kugira ngo mubashe kwita ku uzima bwanyu.

K9SEvAAQXFOGwyv8tTbY.transcription: Inyubako nini ikorerwamo ibikorwa bitandukanye byiganjemo amabara y'icyatsi, ubururu ndetse n'umukara, iyi nyubako ikorerwamo ibikorwa bigiye bitandukanye.

xOsD2PbxCBxnRyr7kJHv.transcription: Aya ni amoko yibimera afite ibibabi by'umuhondo ndetse andi akagira iby'icyatsi kibisi, byose biteretse mu ma vase ari ahantu mu gipangu, ibi bimera bikorwamo umuti gakondo uvura.

wOFOwYADItQYSci2PXc2.transcription: Umukobwa w'imibiri yombi usa neza cyane, ari guseka yerekana amenyo ye, hanyuma yafashe intoki ze azigira uruziga hagati yerekana umunwa.

BOEA1HCrKtk9L44lX2nM.transcription: Inyubako yo kwa muganga ndetse ifite isuku nyinshi cyane, yubatswe mu buryo bugezweho, irimo ibikoresho bitandukanye, byifashishwa batanga, banoza serivisi y'ubuvuzi. Harimo intebe ndetse n'ibindi.

norsg2HpOKf5vux381fA.transcription: Umubyeyi ugeze mu za bukuru wicaye mu kagare bashyiramo abarwayi barembye, muganga wicaye imbere ye arimo gupima uko umutima we utera kugira ngo hafatwe icyemezo niba bamusezerera cyangwa aguma mu bitaro.

3OAL1YuO85HcXeVpsTWP.transcription: Abana bahagaze ku ivomero bambaye imyenda isa hejuru kake no hasi kake, bafite indobo z'umuhondo barikuvomeramo amazi ku marobine atatu.

JBVcSj4RVMmJ4D63bTwH.transcription: Ni umukobwa uri gukoresha akadodo gatoya akura imyanda mu menyo iba yanze kuvanwamo n'uburoso kugira ngo yongerere ubuzima bwiza amenyo ayarinde gupfa.

9HSwTtPCekpvkiercOTl.transcription: Umugore w'umuganga ahagaze imbere y'abantu benshi bicaye mu ihema, akaba ari kubaganiriza ku bijyanye n'ubuzima ababwira uburyo ki bagomba kubwitaho bakabusigasira.

CMHt5nCZgM1Ck4xwue3N.transcription: Ibimera byiza cyane, biri ahantu hagaragara ko bibona umuyaga ndetse n'imvura, birasa neza, bifite amababi, harimo utubabi twagiye ducimbagurika, ariko hakaba n'utundi tumeze neza, ibi bimera rero byifashishwa hategurwa imiti gakondo.

eHU6hIJuV3PXTbeMCxGj.transcription: Umukobwa ukiri muto uri kumwe n'umwana muto cyane baje kuvoma ku kiyaga bitwaje amajerekani, aho bari kuvoma amazi ava mu kiyaga akajya mu majerekani yabo.

evlKi8w4CBmHCgF2aW0o.transcription: Aba ni ab'abanyeshuri bari kuvoma amazi meza afite isuku, bari kuyavomera mu ndobo z'imihondo, bambaye iniforume za kaki, urabona ko bishimye cyane.

3ILo0PK2X2Wy7HbYQjTK.transcription: Abantu benshi bahagaze muri abo bantu harimo abagore n'abagabo bambaye imyambara ifite amabara agiye atandukanye, iruhande rwabo hari ibendera rifite amabara atatu harimo ibara ry'icyatsi, ibara ry'umuhondo n'ibara ry'ubururu.

BgF1lPGUvRLa5eZzIwXk.transcription: Inyunganirangingo ihabwa abantu bagize ikibazo cyo kuba batabasha kugenda neza akayifata mu kuboko bigatuma abasha kugenda urugendo atari bukore atayifite.

8V6vTWTM9LSwIWvuXQOE.transcription: Ikigo gishinzwe kwita ku bana, cyane cyane kibaha ubufasha bw'ibanze, haba imyenda ndetse n'ibiryo, cyane cyane abana batagira iwabo, aho bahabwa aho kuba, bakitabwaho. Hano urabona ko ari umuntu ari gufasha umwana. Amukorera amazi, bigaragara ko avuye kuvoma.

ghn383P1evD1srlOL7le.transcription: Iki ni ikigo gishinzwe kwita ku buzima bw'abantu binyuze mu gutanga imiti ndetse n'ubujyanama mu myitwarire abantu bagira kugira ngo barusheho kugira ubuzima bwiza harimo nko kurya indyo yuzuye igizwe n'ibyubaka umubiri ibirinda indwara ndetse n'ibitera imbaraga .

d8lU0kPWqyehF3ZE44IE.transcription: Ababyeyi batatu bambaye imyenda yiganjemo amabara y'umweru, umuhondo ndetse bafite imisatsi myinshi kandi myiza, bafite telefone mu ntoki.

ph2loFJ5JagIkzXeFkJJ.transcription: Ifoto yo mu cyuma basikannye umutwe w'umuntu batwereka ibice by'imbere mu mutwe nko mu bwonko, bari kureba kwa muganga ikibazo afite mu mutwe nimba arwaye.

11xQBlnkupcSrqgopCVm.transcription: Abantu iyo bari kumwe bizihiwe bakabyina bagasabana, usanga hari ikintu kigenda neza mu mibanire yabo kubera ko bituma baba inshuti ndetse bakaba banabana hafi.

E3e1WUHSniOp76YPvrnH.transcription: Inyubako iri ahantu heza cyane, hari abakobwa babiri ndetse n'abasore babiri, bafite udukingirizo ndetse harimo baratwereka uburyo udukingirizo dukoreshwamo, kandi n'uburyo twakirinda mu gihe turi gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina.

I82FI72QMUvdq6qsyZaR.transcription: Umusore w'umuzungu wambaye ikabutura n'insengero y'umweru ndetse n'inkweto asa nk'uri kwirukanka cyane akora imyitozo ngororamubiri inyuma ye hari imbuto n'imboga bitandukanye harimo karoti ndetse n'amacunga.

vMkElC1CA4lUzR5L3jB9.transcription: Itsinda ry'abaganga b'inzobere bakaba barangije amahugurwa bambaye impuzankano y'amataburiya y'umweru harimo abagabo ndetse n'abagore hagati muri bo harimo umuzungukazi wambaye umwenda utukura.

pPy8rA1UgVYijUDphb5z.transcription: Ni urubyiruko rw'abanyeshuri benshi bari mu muhanda bari gutambuka ndetse bari gutanga ubutumwa bwo kwirinda kanseri y'ibere, haranditse ku bipapuro bafite ngo twirinde kanseri y'ibere, tuyisuzumisha hakiri kare kuko ivurwa igakira.

6gUFk4pYQfjY0KEriAvE.transcription: Amoko y'imiti ikomoka ku bimera agiye atandukanye. Iyi miti rero imwe ikaba iri mu dusekuru indi ikaba iri mu dusorori. Ni byiza ko tumenya uko dukwiye kwirinda maze tugasigasira amagara yacu kuko amagara aseseka ntayorwe.

CQHBdTuDpbtLwXROm0WT.transcription: Umugore w'umuzungu wambaye umupira w'umweru, umupira uciye amaboko, umupira udafite ikora, wambaye isaha mu kaboko k'iburyo, wambaye igikomo ku kaboko k'ibumoso, ufite mikoro, mikoro y'umukara, ufite n'imisatsi, inyuma ye hari icyapa cya  UNICEF.

Uyj0i5DocrDwMfWUkAdO.transcription: Ifoto igaragaza mu kanwa, aho hagaragara amenyo afite ibara ry'umweru ndetse n'umukara mukeya, hakaba hagaragara ishinya ifite ibara ry'umukara ndetse n'umweru muke.

ZZvFIIGMp5Dve6GIj1z6.transcription: Iki ni ikimera gifite amababi y'icyatsi kibisi, aya mababi rero akaba yifashishwa bari gutunganya umuti gakondo, aho bayasoroma bakayavuguta maze bakayaha umwana ufite ikibazo cyo mu nda, agahita yoroherwa.

CNBfUVcEQcp76qBlXBLD.transcription: Umuntu uri mu myitozo ngororamubiri, yambaye isengeri ndetse n'ikabutura by'umukara, yazamuye ukuguru kwe kw'iburyo agutereka ku rugo rw'ibiti rumuri imbere, akaguru ke k'ibumoso gashinze hasi, arunamye yarambuye amaboko yombi ayakoza ku kuguru kwe kw'iburyo.

IENlMgha8Kdw3vKqreCC.transcription: Inzu isize irangi ry'iroza, ifite inkingi zisize irangi ry'ivu, imbere y'umuryango hakaba hateretse intebe zifite ibara ry'umutuku n'agasanduku k'ibitekerezo, ku ruhande rwabo hari icyapa kiririmo ibara ry'umweru, cyandikishijweho amagambo y'umukara.

R7C3bwYHd2ulruPwQE4t.transcription: Urupapuro rw'umweru, ruriho ikirango cya Unicef, urwo rupapuro rukaba ruriho amagambo ari mu rurimi rw'icyongereza, yandikishijwe ibara ry'umukara kuri urwo rupapuro hakaba hariho ishusho y'abantu bahagaze ari benshi batandukanye, harimo abagore ndetse n'abana.

3JJ35bPKk71CdFVXIyGl.transcription: Umuntu w'igitsina gabo w'umuganga wambaye itaburiye yabugenewe, afite kaske mu ntoki ze isa ibara ry'umutuku, iruhande rwe hari kizimyamwoto, ari mu cyumba gisa na sale ariho arifotoza.

gKcntCYBAtT7VG1j9CDp.transcription: Icyumba kinini kirimo igitanda cy'umukara bigaragara ko aha hantu ari kwa muganga, hari n'ibindi bikoresho bihari nk'ameza ndetse hari amarangi y'umweru n'amadirishya y'umweru, ikigaragara cyo aha hantu hashobora kuba hatangirwa serivisi zijyanye n'ubuvuzi.

KyMgeqeTeyGptV4XcV2k.transcription: Abantu babiri bigaragara ko bari gutanga ubutabazi bw'ibanze ku mukinnyi wari uri gukina, akaba agiriye ikibazo mu mukino, inyuma yaho, hari abandi bakomeje gukina.

03HVrFgtCBvo8EimCuqY.transcription: Ibikapu byabugenewe byitwazwa cyane cyane n'abantu bakora imyitozo, ari bo twita abasiporutifu. Iki igizwe n'imiti igitandukanye ndetse n'utundi dukoresho umuntu ashobora gukoresha mu buryo bw'ibanze.

YXPrA5pgNJuyImheXboZ.transcription: Ishusho igaragaza ukuboko n'igice cyo hasi cyo mu ntoki bigaragara ko ari umugore ufashe ururabo mu ntoki, ururabo rufite ibibabi by'icyatsi kibisi ndetse n'uturabo.

LyDrsG16j3DM741AkGQz.transcription: Abaganga ntago bavura abarwayi gusa ahubwo bageza n'igihe bakababaza uko bameze kugira ngo bumve ko igikorwa bakora cyo kubavura hari umusaruro ufatika kiri gutanga.

JEQrnIQf6v46CbXvgzxn.transcription: Hari imyitozo icumi wakora igihe wananiwe mu bwonko hari iyo wakora wicaye ndetse n'indi ushobora gukora uhagaze harimo nko kuba wahagarara urambuye amaguru yawe neza adasobanye.

HdMeDIJz8I7fJ3TzUISq.transcription: Icyapa cyanditseho amagambo gifite ibibabi by'icyatsi kibisi, inyuma yacyo ndetse amagambo atwereka ko ari imiti ya gakondo byira bikoreshwamo.

oXpZd9pz3wQV3KgauHxL.transcription: Umusore w'inzobe ufite ubwanwa bwinshi, biragaragara ko yambaye ubusa ku gice cyo hejuru, ari kutwereka uburyo bwo kwita ku menyo no gukora isuku yo mu kanwa.

jKcWwjMJcEhACi4dZJ1g.transcription: Imbonerahamwe irimo amabwiriza agiye atandukanye ifite udufureshi tuzamuka tureba hejuru, tw'ubururu ndetse n'utumanuka tw'umutuku n'utuzu twinshi cyane.

iVXLyV9cXxsZDVwx0EDy.transcription: Umuganga wambaye imyenda yabugenewe ndetse ufite isuku cyane arimo kwita ku murwayi amupima umuvuduko we w'amaraso kugira ngo arebe uko amaraso ye atembera neza mu mubiri kandi uyu murwayi abana n'ubumuga bwo kutagenda.

lhzGTMvYrN1Fud2IgamS.transcription: Umubyeyi wicaye ku ntebe y'urubaho uhetse umwana, ndetse hakaba hari n'undi mwana uhagaze iruhande rwe, atetse igikoma, akaba arimo kuvanga mu isafuriya mu rwego rwo kugira ngo igikoma kidashirira.

O2QinaOq8QxdvLg93ScX.transcription: Abantu bari kumwe mu cyumba kimwe, ameza bicayeho akaba ariho ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga nka mudasobwa n'amatelefoni, aba bantu bambaye imyenda yihariye nk'aho igira icyo ibahurijeho.

1y1LRvy4OOrDy3NK6vtl.transcription: Umuntu uri kunywa amazi yambaye agakomo gasa icyatsi,  yambaye isengeri isa umukara afite ubwanwa bwinshi budaconze cyane.

EVrsMAJgWIvePmKFdOMP.transcription: Serivise zo kwita ku buzima bwiza ndetse n'ubukangurambaga bwihariye mu gukora isuku. Aho abaturage cyane cyane icyiciro cy'abana kigirwa inama yo gukorana intoki igihe cyose wavuye ahantu hatari heza.

YQvdD8CivYMEQ410Xlsw.transcription: Abantu benshi cyane bambaye imyenda isa hejuru, bambaye imipira y'umweru irimo ikirangantego. Bafite ibyapa mu ntoki bivuga biti twirinde kanseri y'ibere, kanseri y'ibere ni imwe mu ndwara zihangayikishije isi ndetse n'u Rwanda muri rusange.

LecB4YzoXmdHiPCfoXdd.transcription: Inyubako icuruza imiti izwi nka farumasi ikaba yanditseho ko bakorana n'ibigo bitandukanye by'ubwishingizi.

xHpLBc9TLR2C1KRfmeDH.transcription: Abajyanama mu by'ubuhinzi barimo gusobanura uko ibimera bivamo imiti gakondo byakwitabwaho ndetse bigakorerwa kugira ngo bitange umusaruro uri hejuru.

KSyzDLfc2QlLmrvKDanj.transcription: Abantu batandukanye, bitabiriye ibiganiro, imbere yabo hari ubaha ikiganiro, wambaye agakoti keza k'umukara, aba bantu biganjemo abakecuru n'abasaza, n'abandi bari mu myaka itari mitoya.

lsYeNqM8Hc1crn5R121l.transcription: Ni ibiganza bibiri bifashe mu ntoki urwasaya rumwe rw'amenyo, ari guteramo urushinge muri urwo rwasaya hagati mu ishinya, yambaye ga z'umutuku afite n'urushinge ruriho akantu k'umuhondo.

W9dhkpTweM1IxoKwxkTb.transcription: Icyumba cy'abarwayi harimo abaganga bambaye imyenda y'umweru, baripfukiranyije hose guhera hasi  kugeza hejuru, harimo n'abarwayi baryamye ku bitanda, harimo n'ibindi bikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga nka mudasobwa ndetse n'ibindi.

Xvy0OGoDZpmnbZ8Xz4Fy.transcription: Inzu igeretse ifite ibara rijya gusa umweru, ku ruhande rwayo hari n'indi nzu igeretse n'indi itageretse ifite ibara rijya gusa umwe n'indi ifite ibara rijya gusa umukara, imbere yaho hari ikidendezi gikusanyirizwamo amazi.

O0e9mJ4xOlhzmeydqzVm.transcription: Abana bane barimo barakarabywa n'umugabo ubari iruhande, umugabo afite agakombe arimo arasukisha amazi akarabya abana abo bana bahagaze ku ibasi.

mTDTgwQwuZiFVPAzLalf.transcription: Umujyanama w'ubuzima mumpuzankano y'umweru, ndetse n'ibara ry'umutuku  ku maboko, ari gusuzuma umwana mutoya w'imyaka itanu, ndetse afite ikaramu mu ntoki.

9bF2YZtWBHcZBuNfcyih.transcription: Icupa ririmo umuti rifite umufuniko w'umweru ushushanyijeho agasimba kari kuguruka n'amagambo yanditse munsi yako biteretse ku isahani y'umweru hariho amaronji n'izindi mbuto.

rilT6tKXghYq92ChFpwj.transcription: Ababyeyi bafite abana batoya bari munsi y'imyaka itanu babazanye ku kigo nderabuzima abajyanama b'ubuzima bashishikariza gukangurira ababyeyi kujyana abana kwa muganga igihe cyose bagenewe gufata inkingo.

BuZkxhBDSTnYcQT6m3jt.transcription: Abana babiri, umukuru muri bo akaba arimo arakarabira mu ndobo, umwana umwe mutoya umuhagaze imbere akaba afite ibinika isa ubururu ndetse n'indobo bari kogeramo na yo ikaba isa ubururu.

SIWksppvWuqPgJO4jpsk.transcription: Itsinda rya'bantu biganjemo abagabo n'abagore. Bifotoje bamwe bicaye ku ntebe y'urubaho abandi bahagaze inyuma yabo, bambaye imyenda yiganjemo ibara ry'umweru, umukara, ubururu, n'ayandi iruhande rw'iyo foto barimo hari ibirango bitandukanye harimo n'ikiranga kaminuza.

XiZO5Gw9QCXjMnhrcD0z.transcription: Abagore babiri bishimye bari kumwenyura batambuka mu umuhanda, umwe ukuboko kureba inyuma ukundikureba imbere ateze agatambaro k' umutuku mu mutwe, yambaye imyenda isa hose undi bari kumwe yambaye iy'ubururu ku kuboko hariho umweru.

ejwm0XzDCxdlsmkYGepS.transcription: Aha ni kwa muganga aho bavurira amenyo, turi kubona icyuma gikura amenyo kiriho iryinyo ryavuyemo neza, riwe n'umuganga w'umuhanga, hasigaramo umwobo ukomeye, aha rero dukwiye kwirinda indwara z'amenyo zituma badukura.

V8WamFJ0zdq9bbNp248y.transcription: Ubwoko bw'ibinyobwa bitandukanye bikozwe mu bintu bitandukanye, biri mu ibikarito hariho igishushanyijeho umukobwa ukenyeye isume mu mabere, hariho igishushanyijeho igikombe cy'ikawa, harimo igishushanyijeho imbuto z'ubwoko butandukanye ndetse hari n'ikindi kiri mu ibara rya shokora gishushanyijeho ikawa irikuvamo umwotsi, ku ruhande rwaho hateretse igikombe kirimo ikawa.

SWbW16IjxakFWQsQZMG1.transcription: Umusaza bigaragara ko akuze kuko imvi ari uruyenzi ari kumwe n'umukobwa ushinzwe gukurikirana ubuzima bwe bwa buri munsi, aho afite imiti mu ntoki ari kumwereka ku meza hari indi imiti ihari hakaba n'ikirahure cy'amazi ndetse n'ikayi bandikamo.

Ej4nQieThKzLoxOnjgy4.transcription: Aha turabona umuntu wambaye nabi, wambaye ibintu byinshi, yiyambitse ibintu byinshi, kandi ari mu mwanda, uko bigaragara, bigaragara ko hari umuntu ashobora kuba afite ikibazo cy'indwara zo mu mutwe, akaba akeneye kwitabwaho, kugira ngo yongere abe umuntu muzima.

EAeqSh2TsuJ85lT7MuYx.transcription: Abarwayi barwaye indwara zitandukanye bari ku kigo nderabuzima, bategereje muganga ngo abafashe, kuko ari benshi, ntago yabavurira icyarimwe. Ni yo mpamvu bicaye, batonze, bakurikije uko bagiye baza ahangaha.

yzqJFfTSONzBILqKSzP9.transcription: Umuganga wabihuguriwe mu bijyanye n'ubuzima bw'amenyo, hari umwana waje kwivuza kugira ngo barebe ko amenyo ye adafite ikibazo, mu gihe basanze hari arwaye bayakuremo kugira ngo hirindwe kwanduza andi cyangwa se abashe guhabwa imiti iyoroshya.

2wjXGmrzLccgn6lAul65.transcription: Umuganga uri gupima umwana umuriro akaba ari umwana wajyanye na mama we kwa muganga bigaragara ko ari mama we yambaye agapfukamunwa ndetse n'umuganga bigaragara ko hari indwara zandurira mu buhumekero barimo kwirinda.

BuO7GqitfsrYMky6ObfI.transcription: Abana batoya bicaje hasi n'ingeri zitandukanye, abahungu abakobwa, bambaye udupira twa orange barimo kubaha amata mu bikombe. Abayobozi bacu bakuru harimo n'ushinzwe umutekano, barimo kugira ngo abana b'igihugu bo kuzarwara bwaki kubera ko babuze amata.

4NYtOECdUKrRJBeBgGsJ.transcription: Umwana w'umuhungu urimo kuvomesha igikombe cy'umweru, aho amazi ari guturuka mu kigega. Inyuma ye, hari inyubako y'amatafari ya rukarakara ndetse n'utwatsi.

VMWQFkSSOE5YnS18Vlwu.transcription: Abantu babiri umwe aricaye yambaye imyenda iri  mu ibara ry'umukara n'umweru undi ahagaze imbere ye yambaye umupira w'ubururu n'ipantaro y'umukara ari gukora siporo.

z48M6yQQldscEGoKl4MR.transcription: Umubyeyi ari kumwe n'umuganga wambaye iniforume y'akazi, uwo mubyeyi ateruye umwana we, umuganga arimo arafasha uwo mubyeyi guhereza umwana we amata, bakoresheje bibero, kugira ngo uwo mwana abashe kumera neza.

8cb6V0l6gCnil6WJORZ9.transcription: Ni umugore wambaye ishati y'ubururu bwerurutse, ufite ibisuko ku mutwe we, akaba yubitse umutwe ndetse yashyize n'amaboko mu mutwe ubona ko hari ibintu byinshi ari kwibaza byamurenze.

sALX3d6Nun4MopUCMnl0.transcription: Abagabo babiri bahagaze hejuru y'umugore uryamye ku gatanda, wasamye mu kanwa barimo barakura amenyo bakoresheje utwuma.

6O50vEyT3gMlaKp8ID0b.transcription: Gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri bifasha umuntu kugororoka ingingo ze zose. Nta muntu utashobora gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri, ariko kandi iba itandukanye bitewe n'ubushobozi umuntu afite mu gukora iyo myitozo.

royvNA7kotmvF99TYLZm.transcription: Umugabo ukuze wicaye mu kagare k'abafite ubumuga;  ari kuganirizwa na muganga; icyumba barimo kirimo amarido meza, ndetse n'intebe nziza, haragaragaramo n'umutako.

X1n1Iue71YuPnTTccal5.transcription: Umukobwa uteye neza, yambaye kola cyangwa se ipantaro y'umukara n'agasengeri k'umweru, akaba yazamuye amaboko, ahagaze, imbere ye hari amazi maremare, bigaragara nk'aho arimo arigorora, akora siporo.

hSGH1PWuXFxW17XvP0Tl.transcription: Ahantu heza ubona hari inyubako zitandukanye nziza, ubona ko ari ku bitaro bya kabgayi, biherereye mu majyaruguru i Musanze, ni byiza ko tugana ibitaro nk'ibi bikadufasha bikatuvura, kugirango turusheho kugira ubuzima bwiza kandi buzira umuze.

O8R6PhxnxfAQvmqCQbG7.transcription: Imiti gakondo ihuririjwe ahantu hamwe. Iyi miti gakondo yifashishwa mu kuvura indwara zitandukanye z'ubuzima, iyi imiti kandi yifashishwa mu kuvura indwara z'amenyo, iyi miti iradufasha cyane mu kutuvura, ikavura n'indwara zitandukanye.

xvgUNAPU4pm3PICx42qo.transcription: Ahantu hatuje mu nzira, abagore babiri bari kugenda umwe ari imbere, undi ari inyuma, uw'inyuma yambaye umupira w'umukara, ateze igitambaro gitukura, uw'imbere ntagitambaro ateze, afite imisatsi isutse, bombi bari kugenda baseka.

14U5pxR7RmCdcAkz6oPF.transcription: Umugore ufite imisatsi yambaye bisitiri ndetse na kora, amaboko ye yayarambuye ayafatisha ku birenge yambayeho amasogisi ndetse ukuboko kw'ibumoso ku kiganza yambayeho impeta, inyuma ye hari agataburete kandi hari n'idirishya ry'ibirahure.

ArUG9lw1n6GIga0GDNCS.transcription: Ni mu iduka rirerire rinini igizwe n’ amatajari maremare arimo amacupa, irimo amakarito. Afunzemo imiti igiye itandukanye yo mu buryo bwa gakondo. Ivura indwara zitandukanye yo mu moko atandukanye.

jmzMbxZZcdKX9OF0WgzX.transcription: Ni abantu bicaye, imbere yabo hari abandi bateze amaboko bari kubyina, inyuma yabo hari icyapa cy'umweru ndetse n'umutuku, hakurya yabo hari akandi kapa k'umukara.

XKX8tJDTcBupGM06yHHX.transcription: Abantu bari gukora ibarura banakingira abantu, ibyo bintu byakozwe muri Kovide, abantu bajyaga kwipimisha, aho habaga hakorewe icyo gikorwa habaga hashinze amatente yifashishwa muri icyo gikorwa.

aJ4RBkCoOBbbCSG9FFyb.transcription: Umwana w'umukobwa wambaye impuzankano ya kinyeshuri, ari gukaraba kuri robine akoresheje amazi meza, kandi aranezerewe ndetse ahantu ahagaze hari ikibuga kinini cyane ndetse n'inyubako ziri hirya no hino.

D3XqE8Sc48Na4RPvWbuo.transcription: Umugabo wambaye ishati y'amaboko magufi irimo uturonko tw'umukara ari kugendera ku gakoresho kabugenewe k' abantu babana n'ubumuga, ku ruhande rwe hakaba hari umugoreba akaba ari umukozi ukorera ikigo gishinzwe gutanga serivisi z'ubuzima akaba ari kumufasha.

01VzMPIgaTV4JKf7a7l7.transcription: Umuntu uryamye ndetse n'abandi bamusutamye iruhande, harimo abambaye amataburiya y'umweru ndetse n'abambaye ijere ifite ibara ry'icyatsi n'ibara ry'ivu, bari mu byatsi ndetse hari umugabo uhagaze uri munsi y'igiti, hirya yabo hari indabo.

10bBM3X4DiJUBeoq1DKe.transcription: Inyubako iriho icyapa gifite ibara ry'umweru, hariho n'amagambo yanditse mu rurimi rw'icyongereza arimo ibara ry'icyatsi, inzugi zayo zifite ibirahure ndetse zisize irange risa n'ivu.  Imbere yayo hari amapave kandi hari n'imodoka ihaparitse.

b5IdxIBAXVhULDrk3WGm.transcription: Umugabo ufite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe, yambaye imyenda y'ibicagagure y'ibicuke, akaba ari kugenda atora amashashi  mu muhanda, umusatsi wamwereyeho bigaragara ko ari gusa nabi cyane.

BsdiSAHVotJDCISoZDfC.transcription: Tangawizi iteretse ahantu, indi irakasemo uduce na two duteretse iruhande rwa ya yindi. Iyi bayikoresha ibintu byinshi, bivura indwara zitandukanye. Iri ahantu hari amabara y'umweru.

xsvjQdiHptkMtFV3ylkB.transcription: Ku marembo y'ikigonderabuzima cya Kigina, hejuru ku nyubako hari icyapa kinini cyanditseho ikigonderabuzima kugirango kiyobore abaje bahagana, ku marembo kandi hari umu mama ufite umwana mu mugongo aje kumuvuza.

tYfbhW5xjr5CMKYoNLLd.transcription: Icyapa kigaragaza kwitabwaho ku indwara zo mu mutwe ndetse n'abazirwaye kuva mu mwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri na rimwe, ndetse n'umwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri.

oUb7VlYNNyazw8wtd6cj.transcription: Umuntu ufite ikibazo cyo mu mutwe, yegamiye ahantu ku gikuta cya sima, arebye hejuru, ari gutekereza ibintu byinshi bigiye bitandukanye, utabasha kumenya, umubonye wamwegera, ukamuganiriza, ukamuhumuriza, kugira ngo atarushaho kwiheba.

So65Y0xoUgHVvorMTwY9.transcription: Umugabo upfukamye hasi n'ivi rimwe, irindi rikaba ridapfukamye hasi, akaba ari kwikanda, yambaye imyenda ya siporo ikabutura ndetse n'umupira w'amaboko maremare.

JGFN4Up4yKWNcPmLJ3pX.transcription: Abana benshi bishimye, bari kureba ibintu bigiye bitandukanye kuko nkuko bigaragara barishimye cyane, barimo baraseka, abana bamwe bagiye bambaye imyenda igiye itandukanye harimo umweru, amabara y'umutuku ay'umuhondo, ay'icyatsi n'andi manshi agiye atandukanye.

bXIbOqJjGM52EugLIt6b.transcription: Umugabo wambaye umupira w'umweru uri mu nzu ishinzwe kwita ku bageze mu za bukuru ndetse n'abamugaye, ari kumwe n'umukobwa ushinzwe kumwitaho barimo kuganira baseka kuko bishimye cyane.

83hHtpeQO9ptz7vIA8WI.transcription: Isabune ikoze mu gikakarubamba, yo koza mu mutwe, ni nziza ifite amabara y'icyatsi n'umweru, ikoreshwa neza kuko iva mu byatsi by'umwimerere.

6ehhRzaLdEyV2VIToRGb.transcription: Umuntu uri gukaraba intoki kuri robine akoresheje amazi meza ndetse n'isabune ni ibintu bifasha abantu kwirinda indwara ziterwa n'umwanda mu gihe batakarabye intoki kandi bakoze ku myanda igiye itandukanyekanye.

XwVXzt0wcfSibXAhTRgJ.transcription: Abaganga benshi bahagaze hanze, baregeranye. Abaganga benshi bagira uruhare mu buzima bw'umuntu, baraburinda, bakabwitaho, bakabuvura, bagakora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo umuntu agarukane ubuzima.

rusUVxMtXsPQycUJPg7J.transcription: Abantu bari muri siporo bituma imitsi igororoka, bigatuma umuntu atarwara umutima, indwara zituruka ku mutima, siporo ni nziza.

7AIWuPfVB9G8O6sZ60Yj.transcription: Abantu bahagaze ndetse n'abandi bicaye imbere yabo, bari ku ntebe ifite ibara ry'umutuku, hari ibikuta bifite ibara ry'umweru, ndetse n'icyapa kirimo ibara ry'umweru, n'ubururu, mu bahagaze harimo umugabo wambaye ijire, ndetse n'agapira karimo ibara ry'ubururu.

WoBL5GNqoHKOwmW0v48t.transcription: Ibitanda byiza cyane biriho supanete hejuru zimanitse, amarido meza cyane kandi burigitanda gifite ububiko bwabyo ntibizwi nk'akabati biri ahantu heza cyane mu cyumba kwa muganga.

gwFRXJXnUmUtVwqnaQYw.transcription: Umugabo wambaye amataratara ndetse n'umwenda wa oranji akaba asutamye, ku ruhande rwe hakaba hari umwana muto wambaye umwenda ufite ibara rya oranji ndetse n'ubururu, akaba ahagaze ku cyuma bakoresha bapima ibiro. Ku ruhande rwabo hakaba hari n'abandi bantu bahagaze.

RxRlG699EVeiQQICtgxJ.transcription: Abantu b'abagabo ndetse n'abana bakikije ivomero rusange, hateretse ijerekani iri kujyamo amazi iri mu ibara ry'umuhondo, hakaba kandi hari n'akandi kajerekani gato kahateretse bigaragara ko na ko bategereje ku kavoma.

zI5ECCy1vKZfOFVBmSsI.transcription: Inzu irwariyemo abarwayi, umwe muri bo aryamye ku gitanda yambaye imyenda y'ubururu afite igipfuko ku ntoki gicometseho urusinga ruzana serumu, iruhande rwaho hahagaze umugabo wambaye agapira k'ubururu n'ipantaro y'umukara, urimo kuzinga inzitiramibu.

7xKag8PeWgDV2L0jn9zs.transcription: Imiti kugirango ifashe umurwayi, hasabwa ko iba yabitswe neza, kugirango itaza guta ubuziranenge bwayo hagendewe mu dukoresho ibikwamo, ahantu ibikwa se, n'ibindi.

9EccIHDZ2PSB42dtpJ1e.transcription: Abana benshi bari mu kibuga, bari kumwe n'ababyeyi, umwe wambaye akajire w'umumama, yegeranye n'umupolisi wambaye imyenda y'akazi ndetse bari kumwe n'undi mubyeyi, bose bambaye imipira ijya gusa ibara ry'umutuku, barimo barahereza icyo kunywa abo bana.

1Wp4FMn8c2UT9Dv6usPS.transcription: Umuntu wicaye wambaye agashati k'umutuku, agapantaro k'umutuku, n'ingofero ya gisirikare wifashe ku itama, imbere ye hari undi muntu uri kumuhumuriza wambaye agapira k'umukara n'ijipo y'umukara, yambaye amadarubindi.

0TZh4bEkerx1Rr2wL8oi.transcription: Kunywa amazi meza ni ingenzi kandi ni ngombwa kuko bigirira umubiri n'ubuzima bwacu akamaro. Iki ni ikirahure kiri gusukwamo amazi meza, mu gihe umuntu yitegura kuba agiye kuyanywa.

KhAtQwt6GyfnEdRIEFCK.transcription: Umusore uri kuvoma mu ijerekani rinini ry'ubururu, akaba ari kuvoma ku mugezi w'igimpompo yambaye imyenda y'ubururu, hakaba hari n'abandi bana baje gushaka amazi gusa bambaye imyenda idafite isuku.

Fm0keMrqCyBPIXJrl7cm.transcription: Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko ibimera ari ingenzi cyane kuko bivamo imiti ivura indwara zitandukanye ndetse bigaragara ko ivamo n'imiti ifasha ku bantu bubatse ingo.

CMGecIcm8pAkjD5lwqz4.transcription: Amagambo yanditse mu mabara atandukanye, harimo inyuguti ya ra, yanditse mu ibara ry'ubururu, inyuguti ba, yanditse mu ibara ry'umuhondo, n'inyuguti ya ca, yanditswe mu ibara ry'icyatsi, aho ari amagambo asobanura ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima mu Rwanda.

nDxaa20qGs0AZg0CKzAf.transcription: Igiti kitari kirekire gifite amashami wabasha kubara, urebye neza n'amashami atanu, inyuma yaho hari ibindi biti byinshi n'icyatsi.

LhgsFKBKpHAQCzFgPcXP.transcription: Ibikoresho bitandukanye by'utumashini  ndetse n'ibindi byifashishwa mu kwa muganga mu icyumba gikurirwamo amenyoba byifashishwa na muganga akura amenyo y'abarwayi kugira ngo avemo neza.

Naz52pTexU97QmWEq1t3.transcription: Icyumba gitangirwamo serivisi z'ubuvuzi kirimo ibikoresho bigiye bitandukanye harimo mudasobwa, intebe, ameza ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho byifashishwa n'abaganga.

jpx0CV74Iow6lgsVDUlt.transcription: Umugore uryamye kwa muganga arasa n'uwanegekaye cyane, akaboko ke karimo serume yiyoroshe ishuka y'umweru, umuganga uri kumwitaho yambaye amarinete afite umusatsi kandi yambaye itaburiya y'umweru.

Z0XMjinpkaqcQ6nyRps7.transcription: Abakinnyi bakina imikino itandukanye, bamwe bari gukina umupira w'amaguru, abandi bari gukina basikete, abandi bari gukina vore, abandi bari gukina tenisi, hari n'abari kunywa amazi. Handitse kandi amagambo atandukanye asobanura ibijyanye n'iyo mikino.

l01QHKa0ZdmOHdGkI2GZ.transcription: Inzu irimo abantu umwe aricaye undi ni umuganga, i ruhande hari ufite ibipapuro arimo kumupima mu kaboko kugirango arebe uko ubuzima bwe buhagaze.

BfAGlD12FSfOaYqJBKGG.transcription: Umusaza uri kumwe n'umuganga ufite mu ijosi igikoresho gipima uko umutima utera, aho umuganga ari kwigisha anereka umusaza uko agomba kwitwara na bimwe mu bintu agomba gukora kugira ngo ubuzima bwe burusheho kumera neza.

mL1jNAb7up8gXnTIwKb1.transcription: Abaganga bakorera ku mavuriro atandukanye bakomeza kwita ku barwayi kuko hari n'ababa baje bakahaba bari mu bitaro kugira ngo bakomeze kwitabwaho, hanyuma aho barara bakabashyiriraho n'inzitiramibu.

0eRAig7qb249eISCdD33.transcription: Imbere y'inzu iri imbere y'ibendera ry'u Rwanda, ifite irangi ry'umweru hejuru ugana ku gisenge, hasi yubakishije amabuye, ifite inzugi zisize irangi ry'ubururu, hateranira abantu benshi biganjemo abagore, bari impande y'igishararagati cy cy'umweru.

4UGs0IGjQdY3HJIw1rJc.transcription: Abantu bakuze abana n'urubyiruko, kuvomero rusange baje kuvoma amazi, bazanye ibivomesho bitandukanye, bamwe bafite inkoni nyuma yabo hari amazi ndetse n'inzu ihubatse n'urutoki.

qQZ8RvhMaLSvpB0o6Y38.transcription: Siporo ni ubuzima iyo umuntu akora siporo ubwonko bwe burushaho gukora neza baratwereka ukuntu ubwonko butekereza iyo umuntu akora siporoba butekereza kure kandi bukora vuba kuko buba bwaratojwe.

tflaWzhwi5xdK9d78H8Q.transcription: Ni inyubako nziza cyane yubakishije ibirahurire ndetse ifite amabara y'umukara ndetse n'umutuku iruhande rwiyo nyubako hari igishushanyo ikiriho umukobwa n'umusore bose bambaye amataratara.

azOakA3Nv3Gt4GfVPahG.transcription: Igikapu kirimo imiti ikoreshwa muri siporo, muri iki gikapu harimo amoko y'imidage atandukanye harimo: ibinya, harimo ga, harimo bande, ndetse n'indi yose ikenerwa mu gihe hagize uyikenera.

tN9u6kEZgwurmnvmEHDG.transcription: Amabwiriza agenga abantu bifuza gukora ubuvuzi gakondo muri Afurika, ubu buvuzi gakondo iyo budasuzumwe neza n'abayobozi babishinzwe bitera ibibazo bitandukanye, aho usanga bamwe batanga imiti igira ingaruka zitari nziza ku buzima bw'umuntu.

HkAWIq2bpYeYcWTKHBRB.transcription: Ni byiza ndetse ni iby'agaciro ko twitabira gahunda zitandukanye z'ubuzima ndetse tukirinda kuvangura, twese tugashyira hamwe nta muhungu, nta mukobwa twese tugomba gushyira hamwe tukita ku buzima.

EP52Ha0EFmMcXKFlOqsT.transcription: Umugore w'imibiri yombi wambaye isengeri y'icyatsi n'ikabutura y'ubururu, aho yambaye inkweto uri mu myitozo ngororamubiri.

NyVyIrTCZ2ULCNGXXt7F.transcription: Umuntu uri mu busore, akaba yambaye ipantaro n'umupira n'inkweto zifunze, akaba arimo gutaruka yirukanaka cyane, akora siporo. Imbere ye hariho imbuto zigiye zihari karoti, intoryi, n'ibindi byinshi cyane.

yUXzcKRFEr92Hf0Ev0Rv.transcription: Inyubako itangirwamo serivisi zigiye zitandukanye zerekeranye n'ubuvuzi, aho turi kubona icyapa kiriho umugore wambaye amadarubindi kiri mu ibara ry'umweru ndetse n'umutuku.

69qkakBzFPRg37W6hh6D.transcription: Iyi foto iragaragaraho abana batatu bambaye impuzankano y'ishuri bari ku ivomero rusange bakaraba intoki mu buryo bwo kwimakaza umuco w'isuku mbere yo kurya cyangwa uvuye mu bwiherero ugomba guca ku ku ivomero bakaraba imbere yaho hari robine eshatu.

rqBXpfC6VnXXXpt9aOeP.transcription: Umwana w'umunyeshuri wambaye impuzankano yicaye ku ntebe imbere ye hari ameza arimo kureba umuntu umuri imbere aseka cyane afite akabiswi arimo kurya kugira ngo agarure ubuyanja.

m9OPu2cPJYO4vujcQA6O.transcription: Aha ngaha hari ubwoko butandukanye bw'imiti ariko imiti  cyane cyane ikaba ikoreshwa mu kuvura indwara z'uruhu. Murabona ko rero ari imiti yifashishwa muri siporo ,igihe umuntu ahuye n'ikibazo  muri siporo ,akaba yakoresha umwe muri iyi miti kugira ngo akomeze kumererwa neza.

DOSmky69ocvdVd2armTm.transcription: Ibikoresho byo kwa muganga byiganjemo imiti imikasi ndetse n'utunini, hariho n'agakapu gatwarwamo imiti umuntu ashobora kuyikoresha mu gihe habayeho ikibazo runaka nk'impanuka umuntu akaba ashobora kwiha ubutabazi bw'ibanze.

A8fp2QjLXjn1nkSaegOG.transcription: Icyumba cyagutse cyo kwa muganga kirimo amabara y'umweru ndetse n'ay'ubururu, kirimo ibikoresho bitandukanye yaba ibyifashishwa n'abaganga ndetse n'ibifasha abarwayi harimo kandi igitanda kinini cyane kiryamamo umurwayi n'igitanda kiri mu mabara y'ubururu.

mZTwZeoLRhhiZEkI1DiN.transcription: Icyapa kiriho abakinnyi batatu bakina umukino wa rugubi bambaye uturindadanmutwe ndetse cyanditseho amagambo yo mu Cyongereza agira ati impanuka biroroshye kuyirinda kina neza.

7KHHbYk9OEoNkX7j2TW0.transcription: Umukobwa ufite imisatsi iboshye ku mutwe, wambaye agapfukamunwa mu isura na ga z'ubururu mu ntoki, imbere yiwe hari ameza ateretseho mudasobwa, amakaye ndetse n'ikaramu.

2GV9tKYnEuTeRumSA8fz.transcription: Mama uri mu za bukuru ndetse na muganga umaze kumuvura, ubona ko bishimanye bose bari kuganira ndetse baseka, mbega anagewe na serivisi yahawe kandi yanyuzwe n'ubuvuzi yahawe.

QqNksNBjiNlrzZFYBCZ9.transcription: Umugabo wambaye umupira w'umuhondo na rinete za  fime, ari guhesha inkongoro amata umwana uteruwe na nyina wambaye umupira w'umweru ndetse aho hari n'abandi bantu benshi bari gukora ibisa nk'ibyo.

Po6NrpaYOn8AxK7OSSKC.transcription: Abadamu bateze amaboko bameze nkaho bari kubyina ubona ko bahagurutse, inyuma yabo hari intebe z'imyeru za purasitike barishimye cyane.

ru7UC1mwknMTPpBMYFwa.transcription: Abantu barimo igitsina gore n'igitsina gabo bari gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri itandukanye.

BG6Rj5K21DISiasDvah5.transcription: Abanyeshuri bambaye imyenda y'ishuri, bari mu ishuri bafashe uburoso bw'amenyo babushyize hejuru, ndetse bari kumwe n'umwarimu wabo afashe ikaramu mu ntoki.

7YOIQRCDJIuj3m1RlARM.transcription: Imurikagurisha ni kimwe mu bikorwa bikorwa kugira ngo hagaragazwe ibicuruzwa bitandukanye abantu bafite, maze bigurwe nibyishimirwa, hari n'imurikagurisha ry'imiti.

WGze4BOHGx04HTc59EW1.transcription: Urujya n'uruza rw'abantu bahuriye ku bitaro, baje kwisuzumisha indwara zitandukanye, aho abaganga ndetse n'abaforomo, babaha serivisi bagendeye ku bimenyetso bagaragaje.

EB1O6WI5cxTJqP1tPHVG.transcription: Hanze y'inyubako y'ibitaro bya Gihundwe aho bavurira amaso, hari ibyapa biyobora abaje kwivuza kugira ngo batayoba, hanze y'inyubako kandi hateye indabo zifite amabara y'umuhondo.

vHXhQ2OAnBGSiSPw5j4u.transcription: Ni igihingwa cy'icyatsi kibisi gifite amababi maremare n'udushami aho bigaragara ko gikikijwe n'ibindi byatsi bigiye bitandukanye, ariko byo bikaba bidatoshye cyane nk'uko cyo gitoshye.

xuSDy8txA0gDc8f8S9PS.transcription: Umuntu wambaye ingofero y'umukara ifite ubwoya, wambaye n'umupira w'umukara mu imbere harimo ishati y'umweru, ufite agatambaro gasa umweru uri kwihanagura mu maso, inyuma ye hari undi muntu uhari.

0aZWapaWrNbiPXBT9tj3.transcription: Umukecuru iyo agiye kuvoma agomba kwitwaza ikivomesho gito, ku buryo bitamusaba imbaraga nyinshi kugitwara, iyo atwaye ikivomesho kimusumbya imbaraga ashobora kunanirwa cyane, bityo agasaza vuba kandi agapfa.

1xMKiPCAbKUfCwzAvCSv.transcription: Abayeyi batatu umwe wo hagati akaba arimo arahereza umwana imfashabere, ariko amufashe mu buryo butari bwiza bigaragara ko ashobora kuba afite ikibazo cy'uburwayi bwo mu mutwe.

0K3BUPHJVPN3QnvfhMxK.transcription: Umuganga wambaye impuzankano yabugenewe igizwe n'itaburiya y'umweru ndetse n'agapfukamuwa k'umweru yambaye kandi n'uturindantoki, arimo gusuzuma umusaza mu kanwa yifashishije igikoresho cyabugenewe. Akaba arimo areba ko nta ndwara zitandukanye zifata iki gice cy'umubiri yaba arwaye bigamije gutanga serivisi z'ubuvuzi ndetse no kuzamura imibereho myiza y'abaturage hitabwa ku buvuzi buteye imbere ndetse bwimakaza ibizamini.

f1ypqANxK9SHpdd74rQ2.transcription: Abantu babiri bari mu nzu bafite inkoko n' undi afite akabuni, umwe yicaye undi ahagaze hirya hari amagi yayo.

XLtTM03FEjPM5dKZADnT.transcription: Umugore uri mugikorwa cya siporo, yambaye ipantaro ndetse n'isengeri ya siporo, yicaye ku umukeka ararambitse hasi, arimo gukokora siporo yo kunanura amaguru, amaboko, ndetse n'umugongo, kugirango arusheho kugira ubuzima bwiza.

QPXDCQKBweFxQhM2pCmr.transcription: Abantu benshi bahagaze bambaye udutambaro tw'umweru imbere yaTwo hariho imisaraba y'umutuku ndetse n'umuntu umwe wicaye warambirije amaguru nundi umufashe mu ijosi wambaye ijire y'umutuku biragaragara ko ari kumutoza gukora siporo, siporo ni ingenzi mu buzima bw'umuntu iyo ukoze siporo bituma ugira amagara mazima.

nWqjGCLTZR1cJ36FQalW.transcription: Umukobwa uri mu rugo amaze kumesa imyenda, arayanitse ari kuvoma ku mugezi wubakiye mu rugo, ndetse arishimye cyane, aya mazi ni ayo gufurisha kuko ntago ari meza yatera indwara.

PKdtaFTx3U2W5tKJXqQ8.transcription: Abantu bavuga ko umuntu afite ubuzima bwiza iyo afite n'ubwonko bukora neza, umuntu wese ufite ubwonko budakora neza ashobora kwitwa umusazi, bitewe nuko akora ibikorwa bitajyanye nuko angana.

GqxP3YblWlbPACyLLR9e.transcription: Abantu biganjemo abakora mu buvuzi ndetse n'ababyeyi bamaze kuganira ku nama, cyane cyane yibanze ku nsanganyamatsiko ivuga iti uburyo bwo gukumira no kurwanya ugutwita kw'abangavu.

F9dCGkcsaJDhevALCSqU.transcription: Umuntu wicaye aziritse amaguru, ndetse ukuboko kwe kw'ibumoso yambaye ho agakomo u kw'iburyo yagushyize ku gahanga, yambaye agapira gafite ibara ry'ubururu harimo uturongo tw'ibara ry'umweru.

8Tvc046PRJBpNsCQdAMU.transcription: Umusaza wambaye isume y'umukara afite uburoso bwagenewe koza amenyo, ari kubukoresha akora isuku mu kanwa yifashishije umuti wabugenewe kugira ngo akuremo imyanda yafashemo nyuma yo kurya agume ameze neza kandi ayitaho.

3Y0m9bqelcPnk0km75Gh.transcription: Umugabo ufite ubwanwa, ari gusukura amenyo akoresheje agakoresho gakoze muri palasitike, birasa nk'aho amenyo ye afite ikibazo, kuko ntiyera arasa nk'aho ariho ibintu bisa n'umuhondo.

ReJe1pAp9sL8FCbkXwbm.transcription: Itsinda ry'abantu rigizwe n'abagabo n'abagore, rishinzwe kurwanya no gukumira ugutwita kw'abangavu, rihagaze ryiteguye gufatwa ifoto y'urwibutso.

Rhk2XVuUrz1rz9C2Yb7O.transcription: Inzu itangirwamo serivisi zigiye zitandukanye zerekeranye n'ubuvuzi, aho harimo ibikoresho byose bitandukanye, harimo intebe ndetse n'ibitanda,  ibikuta by'iyi nzu biteye irangi ry'umweru harimo n'amakara.

JqU6ugWiIflefegU2ZmU.transcription: Abantu bahagaze, imbere y'inyubako nini, ikikijwe na jaride, bari kwifotoza, bafite ibyapa mu ntoki, bagaragaza ko ari ibintu bari kwamamaza, bambaye nk'abantu bavuye muri siporo.

v9U2e28Hzgd6yiTJn4LS.transcription: Umukecuru urimo gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri, ufite imisatsi myinshi wambaye imyenda yiganjemo amabara y'umweru, umukara n'umuhondo.

j9YBMTNL2U7Xo7wyfYwk.transcription: Umwana mutoya ari kunywa amazi ari kuva muri robine kandi ayo mazi ntabwo atetse, ni byiza ko tunywa amazi atetse kugirango twirinde indwara zikomoka ku mwanda.

2B8kQ0RqnpiSLcJCU8SA.transcription: Abantu bambaye imyenda y'umweru ndetse n'ingofero y'umweru, harimo n'abambaye imipira y'ubururu, bafite icyapa cyanditseho "umunsi mpuzamahanga wo kurwanya Kanseri."

VJFmreDHgcuNwH46o74R.transcription: Icyumba kirimo ibikoresho byo kwa muganga. Ibikoresho byifashishwa mu kuvura indwara zitandukanye. Ibikoresho harimo; ibitanda, ibikoresho binanura imitsi n'ibindi byinshi.

TdiF0nlgtWREF5Mt6Zl5.transcription: Ahantu hameze nko muri jaride, hateyemo ibyatsi bitandukanye ndetse n'ikindi giti kijya gusa nk'umuravumba, ukoreshwa mu gukorwamo imiti ivura indwara zitandukanye.

LgPcATzO8h6XyjOlG2JW.transcription: Umwana w'umukobwa wambaye impuzankano y'umupira w'ubururu bwerurutse ndetse n'ijipo y'ubururu mo mbere harimo ishati y'umweru ari ku rukarabiro ari gukaraba intoki n'amazi meza n'isabune.

wc5BGPId1q3GFluAJfhO.transcription: Umubyeyi uri mu za bukuru ari kumwe na muganga, muganga ari kumukoresha umwitozo ngororamubiri w'ukuboko, kugira ngo akomeze kugira ubuzima bwiza, indwara zivuzwe maze akomeze kugubwa neza.

gj9jIVMzvvyLc2ctLXpX.transcription: Abantu bari mu isoko benshi bazanye ibicuruzwa bitandukanye, uyu nguyu uri imbere yateretse amacupa ya mayoneze, icupa ry'amavuta ya elayo, akaba ariho acururiza ibicuruzwa bye.

8Wt3nkPmjzrb9eKT7nAl.transcription: Ikimera giteye mu butaka, ni kigufi, gifite amababi afite ibara ry'icyatsi, gikoreshwa mu gutunganya ibintu bitandukanye cyangwa kigakoreshwa nk'umuti mu kuvura indwara nyinshi ku bantu barwaye, kugikoresha bisaba kugitunganya, kugisya, cyangwa kugisekura, bagakoresha amazi yacyo.

myZ5xRtA8kDO1zRuiRt5.transcription: Icyumba kirimo intebe z'ibiti zifite imisego ifite ibara risa n'ivu, harimo ameza atatu afite amabara atandukanye, ndetse mu nguni harimo ivaze iteretsemo igiti gifite ibibabi by'icyatsi, hari n'akandi kavaze gato gafite ibara ry'umweru gateretse hejuru y'ameza.

KNn0pSfnMOhgELqeaUAA.transcription: Ahantu habereye ubukangurambaga ku bijyanye n'ubuzima bwo mu mutwe, hari umuntu ubona ko afite insakazamajwi bisa nkaho afite icyo ari kubwira abandi, inyuma ye hari umugabo ubona ko yarangaye wambaye umupira w'umukara.

MbBd0Wh7kzZUVyVChgxf.transcription: Serivisi zitangirwa ahantu, uri kubona ko bishoboka ko yaba ari mu kabari, kubera ko harimo amacupa menshi, kandi hejuru kuruhande hari nimero yo kuba wakishyuriraho, umaze kugira ibyo ufata muri iri duka.

jWac5Krm36BZmmSkSPa4.transcription: Umusore wambaye urunigi mu ijosi uri kunywa amazi, akaba afite agacupa mu ntoki, akaba yambaye agapira gasa ubururu, afite agasatsi katari kenshi ku mutwe, ni umusore w'ubwanwa, ahantu ari hari irangi risa umweru.

jNIfMc3DmLnGQTBwLVLa.transcription: Icyumba kirwariramo abarwayi. Iki ni igitanda gishashe neza, umurwayi aryamamo, ndetse n'imashini ziri iruhande rwacyo, zifashishwa mu kugenzura ibimenyetso by'ingenzi ku murwayi.

axfhcNI8mvGmGfjxj7Zn.transcription: Icyumba kinini gitangirwamo ubuvuzi, aho abarwayi bafite indwara zitandukanye baza guhabwa serivisi ndetse hagasuzumwa icyateye izo ndwara ndetse n'uburyo bazirinda.

bje3WDnjaOO9t41x4vrF.transcription: Ikimenyetso kigaragaza gukorera hamwe bita ku bana ndetse n'ubwandu bwa virusi itera sida batanga imiti yabugenewe ndetse n'ubwirinzi.

IpyvHE8kHArQEHLsDmNP.transcription: Uruhurirane rw'imiti itandukanye ya kinyarwanda abenshi dukunze kwita imiti ya gakondo ifasha mu kuvura indwara zitandukanye harimo ndetse n'indwara z'akarande.

60NYXgAZRNvhQgCYuCaU.transcription: Gukoresha amazi meza ni ingirakamaro, kuko bifasha abantu mu buzima bwa buri munsi kwirinda indwara ndetse no kuzikumira zitararaza.

khOsfv7xqIfg6MEa5NAx.transcription: Abantu benshi cyane bigaragara y'uko bose bitabiriye ni aho abaganga bagiye kuvurira abaturage mu ngo z'abo abaganga bari kugenda babasuzuma umubyeyi aratambukana umwana maze umwana bakamutera urukingo.

DbuwM4zxGhrIE2q2kdv7.transcription: Umugabo wambaye ishati y'amaboko maremare iruhande rwe hari umugore ufite umwana wambaye igitambaro mu mutwe ndetse hirya yabo hari umugabo ufite ikaramu mu ntoki ndetse wambaye impeta ku kiganza cy'iburyo imbere ye hari ameza ahariho ibitabo bitandukanye.

4V78nCJMQxlmJTXW6NUj.transcription: Inyubako ndende iriho icyapa kigaragaza ko hari inyubako ivurirwamo amaso, iruhande gato rw'ayo magambo hari ishusho y'ijisho.

bm2WB3o5XKL7JbVJcF8d.transcription: Abagabo babiri bari mu gikorwa cya siporo, bari kwiruka bafite n'uducupa twa'amazi mu ntoki bari kugenda banywa, iki gikorwa akaba ari cyiza kuko siporro ari ingenzi ku buzima bwacu.

iaCohOewDgtBpI373LPt.transcription: Umusore wambaye agapira k'amaboko magufi, akaba afite icupa ry'amazi risa ubururu, aya mazi ari kuyanywa, avuye muri siporo. Inyuma yiwe hakaba hari ibimera byiza cyane, bitanga umuyaga ndetse n'amahumbezi.

G0GreMAg5kEAgCQGvBcr.transcription: Inyubako itangirwamo serivise zijyanye n'ubuvuzi, ikaba ifite inzugi z'umweru, ibirahure bibonerana ndetse n'amarangi ajya gusa ivu, ni ahantu hari abantu bari kugenda bajya gushakamo serivire.

vJbpdEbYRTcavWiYJfDF.transcription: Umwana wambaye umupira w'umukara w'amaboko magufi n'agapfukamunwa k'umutuku ari gukurikiranwa n'abaganga bambaye amatabuririya y'umweru n'udupfukamunwa tujya gusa nk'ubururu bwerurutse kugira ngo bamurebere ko nta kibazo ashobora kuba afite cyo mu kanwa ndetse n'amenyo muri rusange.

KMJuwNgWFS932ibqf6oi.transcription: Abategarugori bane, bari hamwe, aho umwe asigagatiye indobo ifite ibara ry'ubururu, undi nawe akaba ari kuyikarabiramo intoki.

QdRjkMoAa6lOn40XWk37.transcription: Ubuvuzi bwo mu mutwe, bugiye burimo ibice bigiye bitandukanye, kubera ko umuntu warwaye mu mutwe tutamwitayeho neza, ashobora kuba yatekereza kwiroha mu biyobyabwenge cyangwa se akaba yatekereza kuba yakwiyahura.

3UMsbnhJaml12gfy82Xi.transcription: Ni inyubako ifite ibara ry'ubururu n'icyatsi kibisi, imbere yayo hahagaze abantu bane haparitse n'imodoka, inyuma yayo hari akandi kazu gatoya gasakaye ifasheho harimo abantu batanu.

wSr7p5OYfPhwZ8wBUpsP.transcription: Umudamu mwiza cyane ubona ko yambaye imyenda yabugenewe yo gukorana siporo, ari ahantu hameze nko mu nzu kuko harimo intebe ndetse n'utundi dutebe twiza, akaba yicaye hasi aho ari gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri yafashe amaboko ye yayashyize ku birenge bye aho arimo arigorora.

PeIqJYuhQsglsh2UIxgM.transcription: Umubyeyi uteruye akana ke karogoshe umusatsi bawumaraho, aragakikiye arikukaganiriza kugira ngo yumve ikibazo gafite, inyuma ye hari abandi bantu b'abagabo bari kumwitegereza.

ew3jWB0RnuyMKMQeEuhG.transcription: Imbere mu nyubako mu gace kabugenewe, kicaramo abantu bategereje kugerwaho mu guhabwa serivisi, harimo intebe bicaraho bategereje ndetse ku gikuta hashushanyijeho ijisho nk'igikorwa cyo kugaragaza ko ariho havurirwa amaso, ku ruhande hariho agace kakirirwamo umuntu, kaba kariho umuganga ushinzwe kwakira abaje guhabwa serivisi y'amenyo.

BUeV0WaxTyKAQnfujKDy.transcription: Imiti y'ubwoko butandukanye iri mu macupa agiye atandukanye apfundikishijwe imifuniko y'icyatsi andi n'imyeru bayikoresha mu buvuzi gakondo harimo  amibe, indwara zo mu nda, inzoka, inyamaswa zifata abantu mu mubiri ikindi kandi hari abantu barimo kuza kuyigura.

1g4feFvesvZuYJahuJWo.transcription: Ni intebe y'urubaho iriho ubusa, inyuma yayo hari izindi z'imikara no hirya yayo hari izindi, ku ruhande hari abantu batonze umurongo harimo abambaye amataburiya y'ubururu.

q8xk7buiAXVqB1GoVgQW.transcription: Imyitozo ngororamubiri iba itandukanye, abashaka kongera ingano y'umubiri wabo, baterura ibyuma, ariko ibi si byiza ku muntu utabishoboye, kuko iyo ubikoze bikwangiririza ubuzima.

LNkLh9niJs6YCZMAFvD8.transcription: Imiti itandukanye ikozwe mu bimera, aho harimo iyo kunywa, iyo kwisiga itandukanye mu dupaki tw'amoko menshi.

XjyeEjYdnJ8tPsF6RR5E.transcription: Ni kwa muganga hari abantu batandukanye bahagaze bafata ifoto, bakaba bari bagiye kwa muganga kugira ngo bahabwe ubufasha ku buzima bwabo.

PZIyrcEzIGn1Srn9hFUq.transcription: Umugabo wambaye imyenda yacikaguritse ufite igitebo ku ruhande rw'ibumoso ndetse akaba afite n'amashashi ku ruhande rw'iburyo, ahagaze imbere y'imodoka ifite ibara ry'icyatsi ndetse n'ubururu, ikaba ifite n'amapine y'umukara.

Fdey0bkMQyqsiTsUA3cr.transcription: Umugabo uhagaze uri muri kureba muri siporo, wambaye ikabutura y'umukara irimo amabara y'umweru, wambaye n'umupira w'umukara ari kugenda asimbuka imigozi batambitse hasi kugirango akomeze agire ubuzima bwiza, kandi yite ku mubiri we ukomeze umeze neza ufite imbaraga.

TrAolDNBPNJjpD9Qlg0M.transcription: Ni umugabo wagize ikibazo cy'imvune akaba yicaye ku gatanda yahinnye ipantaro kugira ngo aho yavunitse bahamuzirikire bande, biri gukorwa n'umudamu w'umuganga wambaye ishati y'umweru.

76zcgvvabh02X2FtN6iz.transcription: Icyumba kinini cyahuriyemo abarwayi batandukanye, kiri gutangirwamo serivise z'ubuvuzi kugira ngo basuzume umurwayi, bamuhe imiti ndetse n'ubujyanama ku ndwara bamusanganye.

cV9YSyCiDnWWu7rQ9nLJ.transcription: Icyumba cyo kwa muganga, kirimo abarwayi, abaganga ndetse n'abakozi b'isuku bari gukora isuku kwa muganga, muri icyo cyumba harimo ibitanda ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho byo kwa muganga.

PPTcoveJV0NVJkMitHLI.transcription: Umugabo wicaye mu bwatsi, bigaragara ko ari mu kibuga cy'umupira. Akaba yambaye isengeri y'umukara, n'ikabutura y'umukara. Yifashe ku itako, bigaragara ko hari ikintu kimufashe, akaba avunitse.

jEhw64ef5q2V4FGi9Hr8.transcription: Umuhanzi wamenyekanye mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza imana, uzwi ku izina rya lsrael MBONYI, yambaye indorerwamo afashe mu ntoki ze inkongoro ari guha umwana amata uteruwe na nyina, abagore bandi bose bari aho bambaye impuzankano y'imipira y'umweru, abana baraho kandi nabo bambaye impuzankano y'umutuku w'icunga rihishije, ari nawo uwo umuhanzi nawe yambaye.

iakTfAjNUkshZnKE2lYS.transcription: Abana bane b'abahungu, bambaye imyenda itandukanye, bari ku ivomo rusange, hari kandi ijerekani iteretse imbere, bigaragara y'uko amazi atari kuyijyamo, inyuma yabo kandi hari akajerekani gatoya, bigaragara ko na ko bategereje ku kavoma, inyuma hari ibyatsi bitoshye ndetse n'ibiti.

1bKXfOglXhG93BJqVvs6.transcription: Umusore ukiri muto wambaye amadarubindi ndetse n'agapira k'amaboko magufi k'umweru, arimo atanga ubutumwa bugaragaza ko ubuzima bwo mu mutwe bukwiye kwitabwaho kuri bose, si bamwe na bamwe ahubwo ni abantu bose.

Vx7xN8zQNA8TkMNHVnDh.transcription: Inyubako irimo ibikoresho byinshi bitandukanye, ndetse n'ibyifashishwa mu kuzimya umuriro. Hari amatara ari hejuru mu gisenge, ndetse ku mpande hari ibirahure kuva hasi, kugera hejuru. Harimo n'intebe ngufi, zicabwaho n'abantu bategereje serivisi.

46s5sR0trO0xgICYkI1A.transcription: Umubyeyi w'umudamu yicaranye n'umwana we ku buriri bari kuririmbaz umwana yahimbawe ariko ana nyeganyeza umubiri, siporo ni ingenzi ku mubiri w'umuntu.

QLPd99MbZMyGdpaZXhXT.transcription: Abantu benshi bahagaze mu ibaraza ry'inzu biganjemo abambaye impuzankano igizwe n'imipira y'ubururu bw'ikirere, umugabo muremure wambaye ipantaro y'umukara n'ishati y'umweru na karuvati abahagaze hagati.

nLOHYgAmClDlZ2BWrNZa.transcription: Umuganga wambaye impuzankano y'umweru, akaba afite ibikoresho byabugenewe, aho ari gusuzuma amenyo cyangwa se ari kureba ikibazo amenyo y'yu mwana afite.

QXYCJZroS06wk9yNUYal.transcription: Ibiryo birimo imbuto bigira akamaro cyane, umuntu wumvise ko afite ubuzima bwiza ni uko aba yarariye ibiryo byiganjemo intungamubiri kandi zimwe mu ntungamubiri zituruka mu mbuto, ubwo rero umuntu wese ushaka kugira ubuzima bwiza agomba kurya imbuto.

X7dBXFHgQXnDO4jtxW7j.transcription: Umuntu wirabura aricaye yambaye umupira w'amaboko maremare w'ibara ry'ironji apfutse igipfuko cy'ibara ry'umweru mu ivi ku kuguru kwe kw'indyo ndetse yagifatishijeho imitwe y'intoki ze z'ukuboko kw'indyo.

c6U2owyJCajtegzt1Xwb.transcription: Furaya iriho umugabo uzatanga ikiganiro ku munsi kizaberaho, uyu mugabo akaba yitwa Dogiteri Noel ndetse iyi furaya biragaragara ko yandikishijeho amabara y'ubururu mu cyapa ndetse hakaba hariho n'andi magambo ari mu mukono yandikishijeho amabara y'umweru.

D3GQmQsGau0cPYAsKW2q.transcription: Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima mu Rwanda, gifite ishami rishinzwe ubuzima bwo mu mutwe. Iri shami rifite umunsi wahariwe kubungabunga ubuzima bwo mu mutwe. Aha ni ho ababa bitabiriye uyu muhango baganira ku ndwara zo mu mutwe, ibizitera, uburyo zirindwa ndetse n'uburyo zivurwa umuntu agasubira mu buzima busanzwe.

e8qtMnwNLbCLCpYr849Q.transcription: Ameza ateretseho ibikoresho bitandukanye, birimo igikoresho gihagarariye umuntu, ndetse n'imashini zipima uburwayi, bigaragara ko ari igikoresho kiri kwifashishwa mu kugerageza niba iyo mashini izajya ifata ibipimo bikwiye.

qbj6W4kc2ewGEnI7iyVq.transcription: Aha ngaha murahabona agacupa karasa umweru, ndetse n'ubururu karapfundikiye gashushanyijeho igisiga, bigaragara ko karimo ibikoresho gakondo, bivura indwara zitandukanye.

cgUPeTKJcOFV3hcZlHMC.transcription: Umugabo wicaye hagati y'umupine hasi ku itaka afite imisatsi, yambaye isengeri, yambaye ikabutura, impande ye hari abagabo babiri bambaye amapantaro y'imikara n'inkweto z'umukara, ariko ntabwo ibindi bice biri kugaragara ni amaguru yonyine yabo ari kugaragara.

IOAX9wtmi60lSlhrQX3S.transcription: Abana babiri, umwe afashe igikombe, ari gusukira undi amazi ku ntoki, arimo aroza intoki. Bambaye amashati y'umutuku, umwe yarishimye, arimo araseka. Munsi yaho hari amagambo yanditse, avuga ngo "Washi bajeti burifu".

1M9H4UTsqjHqwsS1oYMx.transcription: Umukobwa uri guseka wakoze ikimenyetso ntazi icyo gisobanuye, asa n'utambaye hejuru, afite amenyo y'umweru n'amaso meza n'inzara zidasize ariko ntiziconze.

fDkXSviy4uMDSStoJsqj.transcription: Umukobwa wambaye umupira w'umukara n'ipantaro y'umukara ufite imisatsi miremire, yazirikiye hejuru, arikumwe n'umusaza ari kumufasha kugenda, umusaza wambaye umupira w'ubururu n'ikabutura y'umukara.

xgerUNQPwbjvXJoB6Wkx.transcription: Abajyanama b'ubuzima bari mu cyumba cy'inama bambaye impuzangano y'ubururu, hejuru bari gusomera hamwe inyandiko yiganjemo amahugurwa abafasha kongera imikorere yabo.

7UtSDoWqKY2sEnNuabzl.transcription: Umusore ugiye kunywa amazi, amazi akaba ari ikinyobwa tugombama kwimakaza, tunywa cyane kuko kifashishwa mu kurinda indwara zigiye zitandukanye, ndetse n'umubiri ukaba ukenera kino kinyobwa cyane, kugira ngo gifashe umubiri gukora neza.

phVAQrAZc53L1lvOBdvX.transcription: Ububiko bw'imiti myinshi itandukanye itunganyijwe mu bimera ikaba igurishwa ku baturage bitewe n'indwara bafite, ndetse ikaba ikoreshwa mu buvuzi irizewe kandi yujuje ubuziranenge.

651IvKkOnBXsjlGGmEHZ.transcription: Umudamu uri gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri akaba yambaye agasengeri k'umweru, ku ruhande rwe hari imbuto zigiye zitandukanye, umuntu ashobora kurya amaze gukora siporo, ubuzima bwe bukagenda neza, zikubiyemo imineke ndetse na pome n'izindi.

d0D7Kyd3TglU0pAnDaYv.transcription: Inzobere mu buvuzi bifashisha ibikoresho bitandukanye bibafasha kugira ngo basuzume neza indwara zitandukanye, ikindi kandi ibi bikoresho babyifashisha kugira ngo babe bavumbura inkingo zitandukanye, bimwe muri ibyo bikoresho twavuga; mudasobwa zigezweho ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga, bibafasha kugira ngo bakore umurimo wabo neza.

3vK9A1CLLoVwNKgFGhpK.transcription: Abantu bishimye baseka bambaye imipira isa y'ubururu, bambaye n'ingofero zisa z'umweru bazamuye ukuboko kwabo kw'iburyo.

i3v0xBZreTfKm9HczGwC.transcription: Ibyuma bigiye bitandukanye byifashishwa mu buvuzi mu gutanga serivisi zimwe na zimwe, harimo ibyuma byifashishwa mu kubaga, ibyuma byifashishwa mu gukura amenyo ndetse n'ibindi byuma bitandukanye byifashishwa mu buvuzi.

HNblJn9h7etq46W0R6Iw.transcription: Abaganga bakora umurimo wo gutabara, abantu bafite ibibazo by'ubuzima batandukanye kandi ni byiza kuko biradufasha mu buzima bwacu bwa buri munsi.

b93Z8g3f0kRliVOizrMw.transcription: Nyuma yo gukora siporo, ugomba kurya ibiryo bitandukanye by'umwihariko nk'amagi, imineke, inkeri, ndetse n'izindi mbuto zitandukanye.

43WAxbSC4N7tVpzMlGMz.transcription: Inyubako nziza cyane kwa muganga aha turibonamo amaitajeri arimo imitigi itandukanye, aya mayitajeri iburyo igeretse gatanu ndetse n'ibumoso igeretse gatanu, hakaba harimo imiti iri mu dukarito bagenda baha abarwayi kugira ngo bakire vuba.

zKhN7cX6tomNimayPL9I.transcription: Icupa ripfunyitsemo umuti wa gakondo, rikaba ripfundikiye neza cyane. Ripfundikijwe umufuniko w'ubururu.

IOtcGhMKRii0Y5Y9QOtN.transcription: Umwana wicaye mu kagare gafite amapine abiri ari kugenda mu nzira imeze nk'iriho amapave, hirya hari inzu ifite amadirishya y'ibirahure, hari undi uhahagaze wambaye agapira k'umuhondo umeze nkaho ari kure imbere hafi yabo hari akajaride karimo indabyo.

FRDscJuU4ernvThSrj1l.transcription: Umugabo wambaye ikabutura y'umukara ndetse n'agapira k'umukara n'inkweto z'umukara uri gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri, aho arimo gusimbuka ku gikoresho cyabugenewe gikorerwaho imyitozo ngororamubiri, mu nzu itanga serivise ikorerwamo iyi myitozo ngororamubiri izwi nka jimu.

fzXmMxPSmGFs35RJYSUU.transcription: Umugore wambaye ingofero y'umukara y'ubudodo; afashe agatambaro k'umweru mu ntoki; yagakoresheje yipfuka mu maso; bigaragara ko atashakaga ko mu maso ye haboneka.

Clvyjp9exSaGGL9vlRHt.transcription: Umuntu wambaye itaburiya y'ubururu uturindantoki tw'ubururu n'agapfukamunwa  k'umweru, afashe utwuma yadushyize mu kanwa k'umuntu uryamye ugaramye bari kumuvura amenyo.

riMdjvQomBFO9JqO3hQS.transcription: Umwana muto w'umuhungu ufite isabune mu ntoki ze, iruhande rwe hari intebe, imbere ye hari amaboko y'umuntu bigaragara ko afite amazi ari kumusukira mu ijage ngo akarabe.

25u4ELPkeYy2uszAq4dA.transcription: Abantu baje kuvoma ndetse harimo umudamu umwe abandi n'abana baje ku ivomero rye mu cyaro bafite ibivomesho indobo, amabaso ndetse n'ibijerekani. Abo bana nibo bari kuzunguza icyuma hanyuma amazi akaza.

yGXMAyLW4rMBCKrH1lyR.transcription: Umugabo wirabura usutse ibituta wambaye umupira w'umuhondo n'ikabutura y'umukara uryamye yubitse inda, iruhande rwe hari umugabo w'umuzungu wambaye ingofero bigaragara ko bari gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri bakaba bari mu cyumba cyagenewe gukorerwamo imyitozo ngororamubiri.

jfBYJeMxcVrF50C9Yrnc.transcription: Umuti gakondo wifashishwa mu kuvura indwara zitandukanye z'ubuzima kugira ngo umuntu akomeze agire ubuzima buzira umuze. Nk'uko tubibona uyu muti gakondo udufasha kugira ubuzima bwiza, bityo tukirinda indwara zikomoka ku mwanda n'ibindi bitandukanye.

UGHwe1zZQNeA2XeP5yv2.transcription: Itsinda ry'imiti itandukanye iri mu ducupa dutoya, mu tunini ndetse no mu makarito. Bigaragara ko buri miti igiye iri ukwayo ndetse no mu ngano zigiye zitandukanye, kuri ayo makarito n'uducupa hari amagambo agiye yanditseho agaragaza uburyo ikoreshwa.

TGny0Hy5a8FCwJIpwjP0.transcription: Abantu icumi, bahagaze imbere y'inyubako yanditseho ko ari inyubako ikorerwamo inama. Aba bantu, bahagaze biteguye gufata ifoto.

FYr3MawwjiGd9alYz9wI.transcription: Umusore uvuye mu myitozo ngororamubiri wambaye umupira w'icyatsi, afite icupa ry'amazi ubona ko arimo kuyimenaho kugirango ngo yumve ameze neza.

673GTO7SKqfHRu893rUk.transcription: Abana bishimye cyane barimo gukaraba intoki ku ivomero kugira ngo bagire isuku birinde indwara zandurira mu mwanda, bityo barusheho kugira ubuzima buzira umuze.

TNneoOfrq0YFWw1M3js3.transcription: Umwarimu wambaye itabuririya y'umweru ari kumwe n'umunyeshuri wiwe wambaye inifomu isa icyatsi ari kumwigisha uburyo bita ku menyo, bakoresheje ikibumbano gifite amenyo, bamwereka uburyo bayoza neza bakoresheje uburoso bw'amenyo.

rDMvtxLr6gcPyrlhCM63.transcription: Akayihitageri karimo imiti igiye itandukanye ikomoka ku bimera. Iyi miti rero irategurwa neza, maze bamara kuyitegura bakaba bayiha abantu bakayinywa. Iteretse ahantu mu busitani ndetse hari n'umukobwa bigaragara ko ariwe uri kuyicuruza.

h9zKHWfB9xMhDPOmCugj.transcription: Umuntu uri kuvoma amazi kuri robine hafi y'ahantu hari igihuru cyakurumbye cyane. Akaba afite ibidomoro byinshi yazanye ku mugezi arimo avoma.

B0IQMJyk7GKJVUP6UTNv.transcription: Umugabo wambaye itaburiya y'umweru mu kuboko kumwe afitemo ibinini bitatu bifunitse neza, mu kundi kuboko afitemo agakarito kampande enye afite impuzankano y'ibara ry'umweru kanditseho amagambo ari mu ibara ry'icyatsi imbere ye hari ameza manini asa umweru.

5h02A1h1Da7ccEPxo7pb.transcription: Abagore barimo n'ugaragara ko akuze, bambaye ibitenge bicaye ahantu mu isoko ricururizwamo imbuto nyinshi z'ubwoko butandukanye, hari n'inyanya.

Kn9fjFWpuBALw9Pb8tNo.transcription: Inyubako igeretse rimwe ifite ibara ry'umweru ndetse n'irindi bara rijya gusa nk'ivu, ikaba ifite idirishya n'inzugi bifite ibara rijya gusa nk'ivu, bikaba birimo ibirahuri. Imbere y'iyo nyubako hari ibendera ry'u Rwanda ndetse n'imodoka ihahagaze ifite ibara ry'umutuku, hakaba hari n'ubusitani buteye imbere yabwo burimo ibyatsi.

C7f4q53eETPENgFvxCuD.transcription: Umuntu ufite agatambaro gafite ibara ry'umuhondo yakazirikiye mu ntoki ze ndetse yambaye agapira k'amaboko mugufi gafite ibara ry'umukara, iruhande rwe hari umuntu wambaye agashati k'amaboko magufi n'ipantaro bifite ibara ry'ubururu, afashe ku kuboko kw'iburyo k'uyu muntu.

WOXVL4Ra6F12GtWq8FOe.transcription: Inyubako nini yiganjemo amabara y'umuhondo, umweru n'icyatsi iruhande rwayo haparitse imodoka nziza kandi zigezweho kugira ngo zitware abagenzi kandi zibafashe.

EdFjiQp8ZM74NIgaftMP.transcription: Icyumba kinini kirimo umukecuru wambaye ishati y'umuhondo, yambaye n'indorerwamo z'amaso ubona ko ari kunywa imiti kugirango akire kandi agire ubuzima bwiza.

60kiNUGt1u4889IjmaUc.transcription: Abana biga mu mashuri abanza bambaye imyenda irimo amabara y'umuhondo n'ubururu, aba bana barimo gukaraba ku iriba bakoresheje amazi ndetse n'isabune, kugira ngo bakire inzoka zitandukanye.

aPZeM33rcdlCwJVpJCL1.transcription: Inyubako ikorerwamo ubuvuzi iri mu mabara atandukanye ishakajwe amabati y'umutuku, hari abantu baje gushaka serivise itangirwa aho hantu.

CRfVYw4MoJSe3O6LP29N.transcription: Umusore ufite ubwanwa bw'umukara bukeya, wambaye umupira w'umuhondo, amenyo y'umweru, amatwi, amazuru, amaso n'umusatsi mukeya, inyuma ye hari igikuta gifite ibara ry'umweru.

JbrIhbWiModRNJslvBLW.transcription: Abana bakiri bato, bigaragara ko bari kugaburirwa amata n'abantu babasutamye imbere, hari n'abandi bahagaze inyuma yabo bisa n'aho batonze umurongo.

lndSmnZ4V01gDaAMvcHO.transcription: Umugabo uri gukingira abana uyu mugabo akaba ari umuganga, urabona ko hari abantu benshi bitabiriye iki gikorwa cyo gukingira abana babo kugira ngo basigasire ubuzima bwabo.

z5DJhqenDsFxaSdNHiAc.transcription: Abantu bagiye batandukanye bicaye mu cyumba kiri kuberamo inama, bakurikiye abandi bantu bari imbere barimo abagore ndetse n'abagabo bari kubagezaho ijambo. Hakaba hari umudamu ufashe indangururamajwi uri kugira icyo ababwira.

7WOIdada08yzn7f4nKpt.transcription: Abana babiri bari kuvoma amazi mu iriba aho ba kudubikamo imidomoro, hirya yabo hari nyamara aya mazi si meza kuko uramutse uyanyweye yakwanduza ukarwara indwara ziterwa n'umwanda.

DsbQsFG9IUOf0JeVlKq0.transcription: Utuzu tubiri twubatse ahantu, biragaragara ko ari ku bwiherero bufasha abantu igihe bahuye n'ikibazo cyo mu nda kugira ngo bajye kugikemura, aha harabafasha.

d0U8vZ0WJzbJ7bUQl92a.transcription: Mikorosikopu iri mu mabara y'umweru, umukara n'ubururu, yifashishwa mu kureba udukoresho duto duto, tutaboneshwa amaso y'umuntu.

YqXooxENr4PVM2pYapoH.transcription: Uducupa tubiri duteganye, kamwe gafite ibara ry'umuhondo wijimye n'umupfunyikizo wa shokora n'igikabamba gishushanyijeho, akandi gafitemo umweru n'umuhondo werurutse n'umupfundikizo wa oranje, imbere yatwo hari ibisate by'imbuto byakataguwe ndetse n'igice cy'igikakarubamba.

3p1V9l0qeGGMt4E1YeVh.transcription: Mu ivuriro, mu cyumba kimwe, harimo ibikoresho bitandukanye byifashishwa n'abaganga gusuzuma ndetse no kuvura indwara z'abarwayi batandukanye.

7cn1zzbXKn9ZLmi9Jqih.transcription: Icyatsi gifite amababi afite ibara ry'icyatsi, giteye ahantu, kitegeranye n'ibindi bisa na cyo ariko bigaragara ko ari iruhande rw'inzu.

G0mI0fLswMlccI9xYcg3.transcription: Kugira ibikorwa bihuza abantu bakuze benshi, bo mu kigero cy'imyaka imwe, bakungurana ibitekerezo, bakishimana, buri wese akagaragaza amarangamutima ye, ni byiza cyane kuko bituma ubuzima bwabo bukomeza kugenda neza, kandi bagafashanya kwiteza imbere.

gCkkvAE8nH2irWbu0fRq.transcription: Ibyatsi bitandukanye bikorwamo imiti aho kenshi na kenshi mu bihe bya kera byakorwagamo imiti gakondo kuri ubu bikunze kubanza by'ozwa mbere y'uko bijyanwa guterwa imirima migari .

ondzIjyAQYXmWhlWCShd.transcription: Amacupa menshi ndetse n'ibirahure, amacupa akaba arimo ibisukika byiganjemo amabara ry'umuhondo werurutse, ateretse ku gakoresho kagenda kagabanya icupa n'umwanya waryo.

iABeHZbJxZSJFj0KtqzW.transcription: Inyubako nini irimo ibicuruzwa bitandukanye byiganjemo ibara ry'umuhondo, ubururu, ikorerwamo ibikorwa byinshi kandi bitanga amafaranga bityo bigatuma habamo ubwisanzure.

A82A0Lkq7zFoVknquWqT.transcription: Abantu babiri , umugore wirabura ndetse n'umugabo w'umuzungu w'uruhu rwera wambaye ikoti ry'umukara ndetse n'ishati y'ubururu yerurutse mo imbere, bahagaze imbere y'icyapa kirekire cyandikishijeho amagambo y'amabara menshi atandukanye gisa umweru.

qc3jjjtt3Lj6rYQipk1D.transcription: Icyumba kiberamo imyitozo ngororamubiri, harimo umusore ukiri muto uri gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri. Iruhande rwe kandi harimo ibindi bikoresho byifashishwa mu gukora siporo ndetse n'yinindi myitozo.

OqlooLwLX2dlLEHiQnbA.transcription: Ivuriro ryiza ryita ku barwayi, hari umukobwa wagiye kwivurizayo, umukobwa wateze igitambaro mu mutwe kugira ngo umusatsi we ahari ushobora kuba ari muremure utabangama, arimo kwitabwaho n'abaganga babiri.

WEoUB3cyqyM2bpjs2Ub3.transcription: Icyumba cyabereyemo inama yitabiriwe n'abantu b'ingeri zitandukanye, harimo abagabo abagore, abasore ndetse n'abakobwa, bicaye hamwe bakurikiranye inama, imbere yabo hicaye abayoboye inama.

a1BUpmlkOqfYCBAMNNle.transcription: Abana babiri bari ku ivomo, bigaragara ko barimo kuvomera amazi mu ndobo, imbere yabo hakaba hari indobo nyinshi zitandukanye z'imyeru, inyuma yabo hakaba hari ibiti bisa n'aho ari iby'imyembe.

47HNNMdCvKVM2EhjfAci.transcription: Abantu bari bazi ibanga ryo gukoresha ibihingwa gakondo cyane cyane nk'imiravumba, bari baramenye neza ko bashobora gukiza inkorora batarinze kujya kwa muganga ngo bakoreshe n'amafaranga menshi mu rugendo.

GbxXAJOSio2eZQEjSQfG.transcription: Mu Rwanda mu mugi wa Kigali, bakiriye inama, aho ari inama ijyanye n'ubuzima, ndetse ikabi ivuga uburyo Leta yafasha guteza imbere ubuzima bw'abaturage muri rusange, aho umuyobozi w'iyi nama yari arimo asobanura uburyo ibi bizagerwaho.

VsZw8WODPOlJ2fVwCmG8.transcription: Umusore wicaye hasi wambaye agakomo gasa icyatsi ndetse n'isengeri isa umukara afite icupa ry'amazi mu ntoki ari kunywa ayo mazi, yicaye ahantu hamwe yegamiye igiti.

XVwIkC0VVaZTspM6jmjM.transcription: Amazi n'ubuzima, amazi ni meza, amazi afasha mu gukora isuku ya buri munsi, mu ngo, ku mashuri, ku bigo nderabuzima, n'ahandi hagiye hatandukanye. Umujene yitwaje indobo zigera kuri eshatu ari kuvoma amazi, mbere y'uko avoma ari kubanza kuzisukura. Amazi yifashishwa mu gukora isuku mu buryo bugiye butandukanye.

PIpvDXJLOSPIRmnujnWm.transcription: Umugabo w'igikara ufite imvi wambaye umupira w'umweru, aryamye ku gitanda cyo kwa muganga. Imbere ye hahagaze umuntu wambaye itaburiya y'umweru.

ZqU0t4SkJT1YSxqo5WNt.transcription: Inzu nziza cyane yubatse mu buryo bunogeye ijisho, iri ahantu yitaruye, imbere yayo hari ubusitani, amatara meza abonesha ahantu hose, irimo ibikoresho byifashishwa mu kubaka umubiri, nk'ibyo birukankamo, ibyo baterura n'ibindi by'amoko agiye atandukanye.

0W9GjVmRdlVhWAF4zVQl.transcription: Abantu bambaye agapira k'amabara y'umweru n'umukara, hari amaboko abiri yambaye ga y'umweru, atera urushinge, arimo ku rumutera ku kaboko bigaragara ko ari muganga, aragirango yongere kumererwa neza.

zK1IYWqaChf9tIDB0oDV.transcription: Itsinda ry'abantu benshi bahagaze mu nzu imbere yabo hari ameza ndetse bameze nk'abaje kwitabira amahugurwa runaka, ku ibijyanye n'ubwonko cyangwa ubuzima bwo mu mutwe. Barishimye bagaragaza ko ibyo baje kwigiraha n'inyigisho baje kuhakura bazifashe kandi zizabagirira umumaro mu gihe kiri imbere.

elQ040dxn5hEi6jbuXqg.transcription: Icyumba cyo kwa muganga umurwayi uri kwitabwaho na muganga ndetse muganga arimo kumuha serivisi zitandukanye kandi yambaye imyenda yabugenewe. Muri icyo cyumba kandi harimo ibikoresho bitandukanye byo kwa muganga harimo imiti, harimo ibitanda, inzitiramibu ndetse n'ibindi.

g7cTTQoxLnKNznSl4wCu.transcription: Umugabo ufite agapfunyika karimo umuti gakondo, umuti gakondo ni umuti wifashishwa n'abantu iyo bategereje umuganga ubafasha, bakawifashisha kugira ngo babe bivuye by'akanya gato.

a24NrbWbABjKSzcBiRiG.transcription: Icyumba bakoreramo inama, kirimo abantu batandukanye, harimo abagabo, abagore, abagabo bakaba bambaye amakositimu y'umukara ndetse n'abagore bakaba bambaye imyenda myiza igiye itandukanye, bakaba bari gukurikira inama bagirwa n'umuyobozi wabo.

73Ujzr7AUOkDl4rBOMBd.transcription: Abadamu babiri bari mu busitani bumeze neza cyane, umudamumu umwe yambaye agatambaro k'umutuku mu mutwe, umupira muremure w'umukara kandi undi mudamu na none yamwenyuye yasetse, yambaye na we umupira w'umukara ndetse urimo n'ibara ry'umweru n'ipantaro y'umukara.

QwdMoh4JAWNN28FuEvYD.transcription: Umwana w'umukobwa usutamye arimo aseka amenyo yose y'imbere arimo agaragara, ari gukaraba ku mugezi, amazi ari ku kiganza, itiyo riri kuzana amazi makeya kandi hirya ye hari amajerekani atatu.

k1rB4ew9KJOVe7hRHkoS.transcription: Igiti gifite amababi atoshye cyane, inyuma gifitemo ibindi biti bifite amababi ajya gusa umuhondo kubera ko adatoshye, hasi hari akantu kameze nk'uruzitiro kagaragaza utuntu tumeze nka senyenge, dufitemo utwenge tumeze nk'utwasenyenge.

XlHdHvBXyxlHm6B68URY.transcription: Agapira k'amaboko magufi, kanditseho amagambo yandikishije ibara ry'ubururu mu mugongo, kandi gafite ibara ry'umweru, ku maboko no ku ijosi kariho ibara ry'ubururu.

YFCkXWPWiEWWn4aGhzAj.transcription: Umuti ukorwa mu bimera gakondo, ukaba wifashishwa mu gusukura intoki, cyane cyane wica utumikorobe duto tutaboneshwa amaso, kuko dutera indwara, kandi mbi cyane ku mubiri wacu.

fNNpSfHQl0Jx5X2uaiW8.transcription: Umukobwa wambaye isengeri y'umweru, ateze agatambaro k'umweru, afite uburoso bw'amenyo, ari koza amenyo yiwe ubona ko yireba mu kirahure ndetse agaseka cyane, kuko afite amenyo meza cyane, yayitayeho kandi ayagirira isuku.
