nPlhpxejnqfaQirDdkFh.transcription: Ibyuzi bitatu icyuzi kimwe kirimo akantu kameze nka supa nete bagaburiramo amafi , umu mama wambaye umupira usa orange, ndetse ukenyeye n'agatambaro mu mutwe ahagaze iruhande r'icyuzi.

Fz62CIdvUvMWvGxPw8Yu.transcription: Umugore urimo kugenda, mu ishyamba, afite umuhoro, n'inkoni, mu kuboko kw'iburyo. Yambaye igitenge kirimo ibara, risa nk'iryingwe n'agapira k'umutuku n'ipantaro y'ubururu.

KaO0s2oUlvqJoWPpb0Hn.transcription: Ni imboga z'ubwoko butandukanye, hakaba harimo; ibitunguru, amashu, imyanya, ndetse n'ibindi. Ibi bikaba bifasha abantu mu kwirinda indwara babona intungamubiri zigiye zitandukanye ziba ziri mu mboga n'imbuto.

9VNfXeWcGQJS1zgi3Pst.transcription: Ahantu heza harimo ubwoko butandukanye bw'ibimera harimo ibiti by'amoko menshi, hari ibyatsi, hari abantu batuye, hari urutoki, hari umusozi, hari amagare abiri aparitse. hari n'ibijerekani.

uGvSlFHcOqgogT23Lk4p.transcription: Abahinzi babiri bafite amasuka, umwe ari umugabo undi n'umugore. Bahagaze mu murima w'ibigori n'imyumbati n'urutoki. Impande yabyo haciyemo umuhanda.

vJMTOzIuBhFAVL26UI2X.transcription: Icyumba kirimo inkoko nyinshi zigiye zitandukanye aho zimeze nkaho hari ikintu ziri kurya bamaze kuzigaburira, ubu bukaba ari ubworozi bwiza cyane bwifashishwa harwanya imirire mibi.

NlkeNTMDROUXSoChDA4d.transcription: Umugabo uri mu murima yambaye ishati y'umweru ahetse ipombo mu mugongo arimo aratera umuti kugira ngo imyaka ye yeze itazarwara ubukoko maze azabashe kuyigurisha umuturage imeze neza.

0wb19ulHbe0dAglfnvQH.transcription: Ubworozi bw'inkoko bumeze neza aho bateguye ibikoresho zizajya ziriramo ndetse zikanyweramo amazi, ibyo bikabafasha ko zagira umusaruro mwiza, zikaba zatera n'amagi abiri ku munsi.

7IPswF5Rcs45wLpQHjUF.transcription: Uducupa tw'ibirahure turimo imiti myinshi igiye itandukanye izwi nka za ngombe, iyi akaba ari imiti iterwa amatungo mu gihe amatungo yagize ikibazo, iyi miti yifashishwa na veterineri mu gihe ari kuvura inka cyangwa andi matungo.

4yzq9Cp7LH2N60F5zeS8.transcription: Icyuzi bakoreramo ubworozi bw'amafi, umugabo wambaye ipantaro y'ubururu n'ishati irimo amabara y'umukara n'umweru w'umwirabura wambaye ingofero, afashe indobo mu ntoki irimo ibyo kurya ari kugaburira amafi.

YUt9V1yZoRiGfkRThYUE.transcription: Aka ni akameza gafite amapine kari mu cyumba kirimo amakaro nk'uko bizwi ahantu hose hari amakaro kugira ngo atangirizwa n'ibikoresho biyakorobora bashyiramo ibikoresho bifite amapine kugirango bijye bibasha kugenda, aka kantu rero gafite amapine kugira katazangiriza aya makamaro

TMYZEIKMu6Regz1CMTt3.transcription: Abagabo babiri bambaye amaserubeti y'ubururu ndetse na bote z'umweru bari kumwe kandi n'abandi bagabo batatu bambaye amataburiya y'umweru na bote zisa umweru bari inyuma yinka.

fMPyoGTtoTmyu73jSTNf.transcription: Ifoto yerekana ahantu bacururiza imiti y'amatungo, harimo imiti y'inka ,ihene, ubona ko ari ahantu ushobora gushakira imiti kugira ngo wongere umukamo uvure  indwara inka n'ibindi.

50jIH4t6EhOJ9a2TQzNC.transcription: Umuhinzi iteka ajya yibuka ko nta musaruro yageraho igihe atitaye ku bihingwa bye, abe yabyuhira ndetse abirinde ikigunda kuko gishobora gutuma, bidindira mu mikurire ya byo.

IEv2pcLuALOjDfsIJ2R1.transcription: Iyo umuntu ahinze ikawa bimutera ubunebwe kubera ko zerera igihe kinini, ariko nawe iyo zimaze kwera uhita wumva wanabishishikariza abandi, kuko zigira umusaruro munini kandi mu gihe kirambye.

9U5qaNpbA6gOYGcf5z8R.transcription: Umugabo uri mu murima arimo guhinga afite isuka y'ingembe ayifashe mu maboko abiri yambaye agasengeri na bote arimo kureba aho ari guhinga.

iHtEHEdgzGav5MNYTbSd.transcription: Ihene nyinshi zitandukanye ziri mu kinani, kirimo ibyatsi bitandukanye ariko bisa n'ibiryoheye amatungo.Ihene zimwe ziri imbere,izindi ziri inyuma.Ihene kandi ziganjemo amabara atandukanye umweru ndetse n'ikigina.

2D6kFvjjllOEe4HCtWt4.transcription: Icyapa kigaragaza uburyo hategurwa umuti wifashishwa abavura amatungo, yaba inka, ingurube, ihene ndetse n'andi matungo.

GXuLfas08seNCGnY2nBV.transcription: Ibihingwa bidufasha mu kuduha amafaranga, birimo ikawa ,icyayi ndetse n'ibindi. Ni ngombwa ko twitabira kubihinga, kugira ngo tubashe gutunga imiryango yacu, kandi tubashe kubona n'ibyo dukeneye.

cQkQTe3AFocMpFkz5LPL.transcription: Inyamaswa zo mu ishyamba nazo zikwiye kuba zabungwabungwa bityo kugira ngo zigire ubuzima bwiza, bakazirinda ba rushimusi n'abandi bantu bazihiga kugira ngo dukomeze duteze imbere ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda, rero ni ngombwa ko tuzitaho muri rusange.

lFLO1lAgVWGaQeSTyoZr.transcription: Umworozi aha ngaha yorora inkoko. Azorora mu buryo bugezweho n'inkoko z'imishwi arimo arazigaburira arimo araziha ibyo kurya. Yambaye bote ubona ko ari uwabigize umwuga izo nkoko n'imishwi y'umweru abona ko hirya harimo ibipimo bigaragaza ubushyuhe ndetse n'ibindi bitandukanye.

BtnlPfV5UNE3rAxwO7DC.transcription: Abaturage hari ibihingwa bahinga birimo ikawa, kugira ngo bazabigurishe hanyuma babone amafaranga. Ayo mafaranga iyo bayabonye ashobora kuguramo ibindi bintu bakeneye bahita barya ako kanya, birimo nk'ibijumba.

0AUSTMKJ4zIqKg8NUCDN.transcription: Iyi inzu irimo ibicuruzwa by'imiti y'amatungo, ni inzu icuruza imiti y'amatungo harimo inka, ihene, inkoko ndetse n'andi matungo atandukanye hari imiti iri mu ikarito n'indi iri mu kantu kameze nk'indobo.

dv4dbt8ZguahFsyXQcej.transcription: Abakora umwuga wo kwita ku buvuzi bw'amatungo bashishikariza aborozi ko ari ingenzi kugira ngo babashe kwita ku matungo yabo babasobanuza byinshi bitandukanye byerekeranye n'indwara zifata amatungo, ni byiza ko aborozi bagomba kugana ababishinzwe kugira babashe kubaha inama zigiye zitandukanye ndetse n'igihe amatungo yabo yarwaye babashe kubaha imiti ikiza ayo matungo.

WQYFlEuuChigzgA9HNth.transcription: Imiti yifashishwa mu buhinzi, iyo imiti ika kabiri iri mu moko agiye atandukanye, hari ifunze amacupa, indi ikaba ifunze mu mashashi, iyo miti ikaba ifite amabara atandukanye, hari ifite amabara y'umweru, ifite y'umuhondo, indi ikaba ifite amabara ajya gusa n'umutuku, iyo miti hafi yayo hakaba hari ipombo cyangwa se icyuma cyifashisha batera iyo miti mu myaka.

hTkgpPMIWLysMgBJUfjS.transcription: Abagabo bane bari kurobesha supagnette amafi barayifashe, uko bose bahagaze umwe muri bo arikuye hejuru ntiyambaye, abandi bambaye imipira y'amaboko magufi ,ndetse babiri muri bo bambaye n'ingofero bahagaze mu kiyaga ,ku nkombe yacyo aho iruhande hari n'ibyatsi bihameze.

urX640vo0Yo5TUgSex3U.transcription: Ahantu hateye ibiti byinshi hari imisozi n'ahandi harambitse.

1ZW4REVhu4AiYQiGXZW7.transcription: Ibinogo byinshi kandi birimo amazi. Bikoreshwa mu bworozi bw'amafi. Umugabo wambaye bote ndetse n'indi myenda y'umupira w'icyatsi n'ipantaro y'ubururu. Arimo kunagamo ingemwe z'amafi kugira ngo zizakuriremo. Ni umushinga ngandurabukungu w'ubworozi bw'amafi bugezweho.

weuMF0sGAf8bhbNmKtqj.transcription: Umugabo wambaye agapfukamunwa k'umukara n'ishati ndende y'ubururu, ahetse igikoresho bateresha umuti kiri mu mabara y'umuhondo, ahagaze mu bigori hakurya ye hari ibiti.

RMZ9lB1rnIIYUdOfXBxa.transcription: Urutoki rwegereye urugo, insina imwe niyo ihetse igitoki. Izindi ntabwo zihetse igitoki, ni insina zegereye urugo. Aho igitoki gikoreshwa ibintu bitandukanye harimo no kutaramo imineke kugiteka cyangwa kugikuramo umutobe.

qfJ7GaRhCiRWrzy5OyEe.transcription: Ndi kubona umukobwa ufashe umugozi arimo aruhira imyaka, ndi kubona amashu yambaye bote yambaye igisurubeti cy'ubururu na bote z'umukara, ndetse n'ibigori bihinze hari n'undi mugabo uri inyuma ye yambaye bote z'icyatsi n'igisurubeti cy'ubururu ndetse n'imibyare inyuma yaho.

jlwtZnCFozRZPssl5NOm.transcription: Umugore ufite umupira buhirisha ibihingwa, ari kuhira amashu, imbere hari igikoresho gishinzwe kuzana imbaraga zituruka ku zuba, hirya hari umurima uteyemo ibyatsi.

XM8cS8fxrJaDInhmQa49.transcription: Ni igihombo gikomeye, igihe cyari giteganyijwe kihingwa, imvura ikaza kubura hakava izuba, imyaka yari imaze kuzamuka yose iruma.

pH9oieeGs8YkB3qk3uVq.transcription: Ibyuma byashaje ni ingirakamaro cyane kuko ibyo byuma aho kubijugunya nk'umwanda ubijyana ahabugenewe bakazafata ibyo byuma bakazakoramo ibindi bishya bikoreshwa igihe cyose.

tsDxdsltQGGe7SF1WHNN.transcription: Umwana w'umunyeshuri wo mu wa mbere w'amashuri abanza wambaye ishati y'umukara ari kwandika ku kibaho ari kwiga kwandika inyuguti zitandukanye zigize ururimi rw'ikinyarwanda, kugira abone uko azimuka ajye mu mwaka wa kabiri.

gFZ03S4rviRvFFqiyyt1.transcription: Abamama babiri ndetse n'umugabo umwe bose bambaye udupfukamunwa, barahagaze bari guhererekanya raputopu, inyuma yabo hari inyubako zubakishije amatafari ahiye.

PrXGzs9tqosiOq9awTfP.transcription: Abantu benshi basutamye, bamwe bahagaze imbere y'inyubako nini cyane igeretse kabiri, ifite amarangi atandukanye ndetse ikagira n'icyapa hejuru kitarimo kugaragara neza ibyanditseho, hanyuma ikagira n'ibati rifite umubyimba uringaniye.

LFn2hoNOD32tYlOoC8IQ.transcription: Ikigo, ubonaka ari icy'amashuri, gifite korutire nziza mbere na mbere, kikagira inyubako nziza, ibiti bihakikije, ibirimo imbere, ikigega gifata amazi, nahantu ubona ko ari heza.

NfSaGrULObwMjDXhIpJ8.transcription: Ikigo cy'amashuri abanza gisize irangi ry'umweru ndetse gikikijwe n'ibiti kandi gifite inzugi n'amadirishya y'ibirahure asize irange ry'umweru, hagiye hariho imibare ndetse n'inyuguti zifasha abana kwiga neza.

votQOQJe10V6UNTgo8Ji.transcription: Igikapu cy'abana biga mu mashuri abanza batwaramo ibikoresho by'ishuri byabo, amakayi, amakaramu, ku ruhande hari naho  bashobora gushyira agakombe batwaramo amazi yo kunywa cyangwa igikoma.

ywFaS7HhBoAm7yGDlkhF.transcription: Ni ibyumba by'amashuri, imbere yaho hakaba hari imbuga, ibi byumba bikaba byifashishwa n'abana bakiri bato mu kwiga muburyo bwisanzuye, bikaba bibafasha mu guhabwa amasomo abafasha mu kugira ubwenge, mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi.

XikcBbFp75O1JMMLGTsh.transcription: Birashimisha cyane, iyo umunyeshuri wiga kaminuza, iyo asoje amasomo ye, agahabwa, impamyabumenyi, ariyo seretifika y'uko asoje amasomo y'iwe.

XqrqjbbtGqO6J72i2jAd.transcription: Iki n'ikibumbano, iki n'ikibumbano ariko kibumbye nabi, birashoboka ko cyabumbwe n'umuntu utaramenya ubugeni, umuntu utaraba umuhanzi ariko urabona ko yari yagerageje gushushanya ingwe cyangwa urusamagwe.

PZLWhPZ6HDfqALmINkyF.transcription: Iyi ni inzu mberabyombi y'ikigo cy'amashuri aho abayobozi bari guha impanuro abana ndetse bakaba bari kubafasha gusobanukirwa ibitaragenze neza, ibyagenze neza ndetse no kubakosora bitagenda neza muri icyo kigo cy'amashuri.

DiJjixiUoaMqp3ZxhfDc.transcription: Abanyeshuri bicaye hasi kuri sima, bambaye impuzankano zisa, inkweto z'umukara n'amagosi y'umweru, imbere y'inzu, urugi rufunze n'amadirishya bisize irangi ry'icyatsi.

lE5rEopNod6IWEF6AA2u.transcription: Abantu batatu b'urubyiruko umwe yambaye agapfukamunwa n'impuzangano z'umweru n'umukara, imbere yabo hari ameza ari igitambaro cy'icyatsi n'akabogisi k'umweru n'ubururu.

Xmd2nQqz0VDzLa2gZmK8.transcription: Imbonerahamwe irimo imibare kuva ku mubare wa mbere kugera ku wa cumi, iyi mbonerahamwe ifasha abarimu kwigisha abana bakiri bato kubara imibare neza.

Xu9qnEyO5q3hl73asno2.transcription: Amarembo y'ishuri, urugi rukoze mu maferabeto n'ibyuma handitseho amagambo titisi Matimba yanditse mu ibara ry'ubururu, inyuma hari inzu isize irangi ry'umweru n'icyatsi kibisi.

tE1XdpMTMp96Ga9Fexdv.transcription: Turabona abanyeshuri bo muri kaminuza yigisha ibintu bijyanye n'imyuga, ni benshi rwose bishoboka bicaye kudutebe, barasa nkaho bakurikiranye umwarimu uri kubigisha.

av90VKLxyirpSlGcuzvK.transcription: Inyubako zitari kugaragara neza kubera ko harimo ibiti bizikingirije, ariko harimo imwe yubakishije amatafari ahiye, indi ikaba iteye irangi rijya gusa umuhondo.

C5QIOpMcPPw4NfDeNUq8.transcription: Ni ku kigo cy'amashuri y'abanyeshuri biga mu ishuri ry'incuke, bari kumwe n'ababyeyi babo ndetse barimo n'abiga pirimeri, bafashe indangamanota bari kumwe n'abarimu babo.

w0VPpRC1lApm0MRYxU2p.transcription: Mu mashuri ya kaminuza icyumba abanyeshuri bigiramo kizwi nk'ishuri, habamo ibikoresho bitandukanye byifashishwa kugira ngo babashe guhabwa uburezi bw'ibanze twavuga nk'intebe abanyeshuri baba bicayeho,ameza bashyiraho amakayi, telefone ndetse n'amakaramu.Ikoranabuhanga ribafasha gushaka ubushakashatsi butandukanye bugendanye n'ibyo biga bizwi nk'amashini cyangwa se telefoni.

6lRgcRE9hwoyogymRmZB.transcription: Icyumba ibikuta byacyo biteye irangi ry'umweru harimo intebe izo ntebe zicayeho abantu, abantu imbere yabo hateretse amakayi, ndetse hateretse na mudasobwa imbere ya buri muntu wicaye muri icyo cyumba.

6MBFwMUwy5YQdDmRF03Z.transcription: Iyi foto iragaragaza ishusho y'umuneke, ingofero, avoka, inkweto, isahane, ikanzu, ururabo, ipataro, radiyo, n'ibindi bikoresho byifashishwa mu kwiga gusoma cyangwa se kumenya ubwoko bw'ibintu.

DeMYupHphP8SflpD50sz.transcription: Abarimu bigisha abana biga mu mashuri y'incuke bakoresha amabara agiye atandukanye kugira ngo bazamure ireme ry'uburezi bw'aba bana, harimo ibikoresho biba bifite ibara ry'ubururu, umuhondo, oranje n'icyatsi bibafasha gukangura ubwonko bw'abana bigisha.

TbqAnzhMgXpd9ap5GwSv.transcription: Abana biga mu mashuri yisumbuye bagira umwanya buri gitondo aho bafata akanya bakaririmba indirimbo yubahiriza Igihugu.Ibyo bituma barushaho kugikunda kandi bagatekereza ku ndangagaciro zabo.

rseB8VjG3RVcIQjVtfVY.transcription: Abanyeshuri biga mu mashuri y'incuke. Ni byiza ko tugomba kubashyiriraho uburyo bwabugenewe bubafasha kwidagadura, igihe bageze mu gihe cyo kwidagadura nko kubashyiraho pisine bajyamo, igihe cyo kwidagadura kigeze ndetse n'ibyicundo bakoresha barimo bakina. Ni byiza ko tugomba gushimisha abanyeshuri bacu kugira ngo babashe kuzamuka bafite ibyishimo bityo babashe kumva neza n'ibyo biga.

7EMr4E0HP0Nf1rOlgh2a.transcription: Amazu atandukanye y'ubucuruzi, harimo n'ubwambukiranya imipaka avuga ko ibikoresho bikoreshwa mu biro birimo imashini zikoreshwa mu mibare ndetse n'utundi bikomeje guhenda cyane bitewe n'uko biri kubura.

amnpxIy2xQmfV2W6vmbJ.transcription: Abakobwa ndetse n'abasore bicaye mu ntebe zifite ibara ry'icyatsi ndetse n'umukara, harimo umusore umwe wambaye umupira w'umweru, bambaye amabaji mu majosi yabo barishimye bari guseka, inyuma yabo hari undi muntu wambaye umupira w'umutuku.

VxNLMwsRlPXX7cYw6JB3.transcription: Ibiko rinini rifitemo ibitabo ndetse n'ibikoresho by'abana bakunze gukoresha mu kwiga, higanjemo ibipupe by'abana ndetse hakivanzamo n'ibikombe, n'ibindi cyane cyane nk'udutabo two gusoma.

KRRhrgP0V6U8OR9ZcpEd.transcription: Abanyeshuri biga mu mashuri makuru yisumbuye, bari mu ishuri rinini cyane, baricaye bose, hahagazemo umwarimu ufite indangururamajwi mu ntoki, yambaye ishati y'umukara ari kwigisha.

UkGlYAZLNsl7wnuLGlQf.transcription: Ikibumbano bigaragara ko bishoboka ko ari ikibumbano cya kinyarwanda cya kera, kikaba kibumbye mu ibumba, kikaba kibumbye mu ishusho y'uruziga, urwo ruziga rukoze ikintu kimeze nk'ikidomoro cyangwa se icyungo cya kera.

jVsp9eDtnG0PODE4Kk3O.transcription: Igikoresho cyifashishwa mu kwiga imibare ndetse kiba kirimo ibindi bikoresho byinshi harimo amarati atatu ndetse n'irati imwe ndende n'ikaramu na kompa, ibigibi byahawe abanyeshuri biga mu myaka ya mbere n'iya kabiri kugira ngo bajye babyifashisha bari kwiga imibare.

0HCnnYNITTKF9ChgofWR.transcription: Abanyeshuri basoje kaminuza bari guserebura ikirori barasoje bari guserebura ni benshi barishimye, bambaye imyenda y'ibara rimwe hari inyubako zitandukanye haradekoye.

bOpHkPDCgtDIxxiG3O4z.transcription: Abanyeshuri bose bambaye imyenda isa umweru ndetse bafite n'udupapuro mu ntoki zabo, hari ibyo bari gusomera abandi bahagaze cyangwa se bicaye imbere.

Wi3GaMs7VQw8qtQuDIL7.transcription: Ameza hejuru yayo hariho ikaye irambuye yanditsemo, hirya y'ayo meza hari intebe ifite ibara ry'icyatsi.

TV2Waf9BYKQBqXOHeebt.transcription: Ni agakinisho kameze, nk'agakoko, gafite amatwi, umunwa amaso, gafite n'utuboko, ni agapupe k'abana, bakinisha biga mu mashuri y'inshuke.

QY0ip9QjN2vdho2MjbII.transcription: Ibikoresho bikoreshwa n'abagoronome bari guhinga; agapfukamunwa ndetse na ga na bote, bibarinda ingaruka bagirarira mu kazi kabo biri imbere ku rupapuro rw'umweru.

Fc4rima4FhIvANZMFiEG.transcription: Ibyuma biri gusa ubururu biri mu nyubako byifashe nk'intebe, iyo nyubako ikaba ifite ibirahuri bibonerana ndetse ikaba ifite amakaro asa igitaka hasi.

njqazUSlrQaoVSbJ1Hy3.transcription: Ahifashishwa nk'ubukarabiro, ahenshi hasangwa ku bigo bya Leta, nk'amashuri, ibitaro n'ahandi hagendwa n'abantu benshi, bakarabira intoki birinda gukwirakwiza indwara zandura.

KFroHiYRMpqBZbW2H0d5.transcription: Icyumba kiza gikeye, cyabanyeshuri bigiramo kandi kigezweho, kirimo imashini za mudasobwa, zigendanwa nziza kandi zigaragara, ziri mu bwoko bwa hecipi z'umukara.

toBtgjzSsvHPicUlS9km.transcription: Ni mu kigo cy'amashuri ya segonderi aho abantu bari gutambuka berekeza nko mu ishuri, bambaye utujire bose bari kugenda bane begeranye undi ari gutunguruka inyuma yabo.

rzR1zu9YsnqA3MV27bUD.transcription: Ingombajwi ziri ku gapapuro k'imirongo minini n'imito ubona ko wagira ngo ni aho bigishiriza abana biga kwandika, kwandika.

5D4NdfTGO2G3RtXnWcH8.transcription: Ishuri ryiza ririmo umwarimu w'umudamu wambaye itabuliya y'umweru, ndetse hakaba hariho n'ikibaho cy'umukara, ari imbere y'abanyeshuri bari kwiga, ari kubabaza ibibazo ndetse anabasobanurira.

cEWtm1ml1EKYqFX3mafo.transcription: Icyumba cy'ishuri abanyeshuri biga mu mashuri yisumbuye ibijyanye n'imyuga bitorezamo gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo bize, icyumba kirimo abanyeshuri batandukanye abagaragara cyane ni bane umwe igikuta ahagaze imbere cyanditseho ngo source technical high school,akaba ari abanyeshuri biga iby'amashanyarazi bari kugerageza gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo bigishijwe.

3MzMIgUZjEbMv7TTjon8.transcription: Inyubako y'ishuri irimo akabati karimo ibitabo byifashishwa n'abanyeshuri bigira muri iryo shuri, hari n'igipapuro kinini cy'umweru gishushanyijeho ibikoresho bigiye bitandukanye, isuka, igidiyo ndetse n'ingorofani bifashisha bigiraho.

O5u712l6lEBkmql561mU.transcription: Abana b'inshuke ndetse n'abandi biga mu mashuri abanza bafite aho bafatira amasomo yabo bikabafasha mu guhura n'abarezi ndetse no mu kuhabonera imfashanyigisho zibafasha mu kwagura ubwenge ndetse no mu kubona ibindi bakeneye buri munsi.

fADPWsAGxIuW9JVf3TJ3.transcription: Urusengero rwubakishije amabuye akotemo sima, imbere yu'rwo rusengero hahagaze abantu benshi harimo abagabo bambaye amakoti, hari abana bambaye amakanzu maremare yu'bururu n'utugofero tw'ubururu, ayo makanzu afite umweru hejuru ku ikora.

DuO7pMwq4l3WsQO8FyV9.transcription: Ifoto iriho ibikoresho bishushanyije bifasha abana bo muri materineri kwiga, hariho indobo, ikiyiko n'utundi dupupe tw'udusimba runaka dufasha abana bo muri materineri kwiga.

XQQ6IqPVZKczdEJDJPCP.transcription: Muri iki gihe, ikintu kigezweho cyane ni ukwiga umuntu ufite amashuri ntabwo abaho nabi nk'umuntu utarize, umuntu wize aba abayeho neza aba anaategereza ko igihe kizaza niyompamvu dushishikarizwa kwiga twirinda gukura abana mashuri tukabajyana mu mashuri kuko ibyiza biba biri imbere kandi ni nabo bari b'urubyiruko rw'ejo hazaza.

aWFWiAouy9zFC8MuCTwY.transcription: Ibikoresho byifashishwa mu mashuri abanza ndetse n'ayisumbuye akaba ari ibikoresho byifashishwa mu masomo atandukanye harimo imibare ndetse n'ubugenge, bikaba byifashishwa mu gushushanya ibishushanyo bitandukanye.

VJmp4DMB47wnOeg7pfOP.transcription: Ni icyumba kigari cy'ishuri.Kikaba kirimo abanyeshuri, imbere yabo hakaba hari abarezi babo,bakaba barimo gufata amasomo abafasha mu kubaho kwabo kwa buri munsi.

khlH8n6EVOCK6pt6ydKt.transcription: Mu mashuri abanza, bigamo ikoranabuhanga riciriritse, aho biga uburyo ushobora gucura icyuma, bakigamo uburyo ushobora gukora ibintu ukoresheje intoki zawe, nko kuboha ibitebo ndetse n'ibindi.

Vj9XL8GQP83JDF8WbIMO.transcription: Igitabo cy'umunyeshuri cyo mu mwaka wa mbere, aho abana barimo kugenda basoma ari babiri, ndetse iki gitabo kigenewe umwana wiga mu mashuri abanza, mu mwaka wa mbere, mu gihe aba yiyigisha gusoma nk'uko biteganywa n'ikigo gishinzwe uburezi mu Rwanda.

LW6Q7xjXHF7o4SggvWiO.transcription: Iyi nzu ni iyamategura, kandi imerereko y'iyi nzu isize irangi ry'ubururu, iyi nzu isizeho irangi ry'umweru, mu mbuga harimo umuntu umurenga, yambaye akantu k'umweru n'imisatsi miremire.

Fa8qYOntSVPXjtujR70s.transcription: Hano hari umwana w'umukobwa bigaragara ko ari kwiga, yambaye impuzankano nziza cyane bigaragara ko rwose afite ikinyabupfura, ni uburezi rero kuri bose, uburezi bufite ireme n'iryo shingiro ndetse n'umusingi w'iterambere rirambye mu gihugu cyacu ndetse no ku isi hose.

bzHqpC7Q3DdiH0CavwS8.transcription: Ibikoresho bikorwa hashingiye ku buhanzi bw'ubugeni, hari imitako umuntu ashobora kumanika mu nzu ye hagasa neza.

jTwoj0upFHvuK1SBFiOP.transcription: Abanyeshuri bari mu ishuri bicaye ku ntebe bitonze, bari gukora isuzuma. Bambaye impuzankano y'umweru n'imipira y'imbeho y'icyatsi kibisi, inyuma ni ikibaho bandikaho.

W9gD9xKdBVStl5rGPCjx.transcription: Umurima utunganyije neza ubura gushyirwamo imyaka, imbuto, hirya hakaba amazu ni ahantu hafi n'abaturage, uyu ni umurima wegereye urugo.

Muy3vXA3xljHTTAlb9vI.transcription: Ibikorwa remezo cyane cyane amashuri yubatse afashwe n'ibyuma; yubakishije amatafari, imbere yayo hari ubusitani, hirya y'aho hateye ibiti.

DnvfzjJ2KZ306EPPSprx.transcription: Abarimu bigisha mu mashuri abanza, bashishikarizwa kwigisha abanyeshuri gusoma ndetse bakanababwira ibyiza byo gusoma inkuru zigiye zitandukanye. Ni byiza ko ari abanyeshuri rero bacu tugomba kubigisha ibyiza byo gusoma, kugira ngo ubumenyi bwabo bubashe gukura ndetse babashe no kumenya uburyo basoma neza batanategwa.

Avdgv2CYiNLCXcWwwtr8.transcription: Icyumba k'ishuri cya ka ha zeru rimwe gifite ibirahure bibonerana. Mo imbere hateyemo ameza ndetse n'intebe, hicayemo abanyeshuri barimo gukurikirana amasomo.

C1jbYmIlB5CDUJCWhWcv.transcription: Igishushanyo kiriho umwana w'umuhungu n'umukobwa, umwe yambaye agakanzu ko mu ibara ry'umweru, umuhungu agashati ko mubara ry'umweru. Umukobwa ari kumutungira agatoki umugezi uri guca hagati y'imisozi ibiri.

NPh1LM3DfpvzGwhHUufT.transcription: Ibikoresho by'ubuhinzi, umuhoro, igitiyo, isuka, ndetse umwiko n'ingorofani.

RaG5OYELmv75anpHbGb2.transcription: Aba ni  abanyeshuri biga muri kaminuza ya  TVT, bari gukora assignment muri groupe basobanurirana bashyize hamwe kugira ngo buri wese abashe kubyumva neza, nibasabumitinga  iyi assignment bazanaperezanta.

6l8Cvo2uLdgNrPGY6Gds.transcription: Ni ibikapu biri mu mabara atandukanye harimo: umutuku ndetse n'umukara. Bikaba byifashishwa n'abanyeshuri bakiri batoya mu gutwaramo ibikoresho by'ishuri. Ibi bikaba bibafasha mu kurinda ibikoresho byabo ko byakwangirika.

usWPTYUCN2mn4WSHM1H4.transcription: Ingofero ebyiri z'urugara zigerekeranije iy'umweru iri hasi, ndetse iy'umuhondo igeretse hejuru yayo biteretse ku gikoresho kitagaragara neza.

BVJkNYTfn37WsXPTXwO7.transcription: Utaganiriye na se ntamenya icyo sekuru yasize avuze, ni umugani abanyarwanda baciye mu rwego rwo kurera u Rwanda rw'ejo kururerera, ni byiza kuganira n'abana,  hano turi kubona umusaza arimo kuganirira abana ababwira, ni byiza abana bakamenya iby'abantu bakuru baba bazi cyane ko aba ari byinshi.

zRQSw5t3FCjMQ0Z4iWSZ.transcription: Inzu, ibiti, ibendera ry'igihugu n'insinga z'umuriro w'amashanyarazi.

hWNvECiBrJ2VcHKkGAb5.transcription: Igicupa cy'amavuta cyanditseho vesiterine, hari igishushanyo cy'umukobwa ufite imisatsi miremire yifashe ku itama arimo guseka, hari n'ikindi gicupa giteritse iruhande rwe ku ruhande, hari n'ikindi giteretse haruguru.

BTbB5aIl7FYIzkzwd3br.transcription: Icyumba gikorerwamo ubucuruzi bwiganjemo amakaramu. Amakaramu ni igikoresho cyifashishwa n'abanyeshuri ndetse n'abandi bantu batandukanye, igihe barimo bakora inyandiko se cyangwa barimo bandika ibintu runaka. Ni byiza ko tugomba kumenya agaciro k'amakaramu kugira ngo tubashe kuyasigasira neza bityo tubashe kuyakoresha icyo yabugenewe.

0A1Ye7l4nnN67nTL9dQk.transcription: Abadamu bane bari kwerekeza ku nyubako ifite urugi rw'ibara ry'umweru. Uw'imbere wambaye akagofero k'umweru n'ikaburiya iri mu ibara ry'umweru ndetse n'ijipo y'umukara. Inyuma ye hari abandi batatu bamukuriki.

utOO9FTAA3ZN5ov0fjuX.transcription: Abantu bahagaze abakobwa n'abasore imbere yabo bahagaze umukobwa wambaye ipantaro n'umupira w'umutuku ari kurambura imyenda y'amabara atandukanye y'umukara, umuhondo n'umweru.

ej99agZjzvA0peU0oSca.transcription: Abantu bicaye mu matsinda harimo abicaye ku ntebe z'umweru ndetse n'abandi bicaye ku ntebe z'urubaho, hagati muri bo hari umugabo uhahagaze ari kubaganiriza ku bijyanye n'ukuntu bazajya kuguza kuri banki kugira ngo babone amafaranga ahagije bazakoresha mu itsinda ryabo.

xMvelldZ26RazW9DPby5.transcription: Inzu irimo ibikoresho bitandukanye bikorwa n'abantu bakora ubugeni ndetse n'ubukorikori, ifite amakaro asa umweru ndetse na parafo isa umweru, amatara arimo araka mo imbere.

6ktdrN3hIkfJBwUJ9yVH.transcription: Aba ni umugabo ndetse n'umugore bihangiye umurimo wo kubumba ibijyanye n'imbabura zikaba zikoreshwa mu guteka ndetse zikaba zijyamo ibicanwa byitwa amakara bifasha mu guteka ibiryo abantu barya bya buri munsi.

DQpHidyHbxlZfYyHDUx9.transcription: Igihugu kiriruka ku muvuduko w'iterambere, isuku niyo ituranga, kandi ibikorwa remezo birubakwa ahantu henshi, aho kurira mu gihe ugize inzara, ahantu nkaha turabona intebe nziza zisa neza, kandi ahantu wafatira ifunguro ryawe, hari isuku ihagije hari n'umutekano, bigatuma urushaho kugira ubuzima bwiza, kandi n'abashyitsi bakabona aho barira, baje bagana igihugu cyacu cy'u Rwanda.

Robf00xkT6Qh2hNPkQ6y.transcription: Inyubako itanga serivisi z'ubukerarugendo, ikaba irimo televiziyo, intebe zo kwicaraho, ameza ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho bitandukanye, byifashishwa n'abantu bagana kuri izi nyubako.

XjIXhUMBaCgPX2quJRjM.transcription: Umuntu uri kugenda ku ipikipiki mu muhanda wa kaburimbo, inyuma ye hakaba hari imodoka, hepfo y'umuhanda hakaba hari inyubako ziri mu mabara y'umweru ndetse n'imiyoboro y'amashanyarazi.

aTeaEe5DPMfuBcd8y52L.transcription: Aha ni mu isoko hari abaturage bagiye batandukanye, hari abari kugura, hari abari kugurisha, abacuruza imyenda, abacuruza ibikoresho bitandukanye, imifuka, imisambi ndetse n'abacuruza ibikoresho by'amasuku bitandukanye byo mu rugo.

tqD6EH743dwjIhGqzbXK.transcription: Abantu benshi bicaye mu nzu nini cyane idafite parafo barizihiwe barimo kuganira, hari indabo ndetse n'imitako itandukanye ifite amabara anyuranye bamwe baricaye abandi barahagaze.

JUdUD9FNzwRsPQepbDxm.transcription: Intebe zisa umutuku, zitondetse ahantu neza. Mo hagati y'izo ntebe hari ameza hariho igitambaro gisa umweru. Ni mu kabari cyangwa se muri resitora ahatangirwa serivisi zitandukanye.

ukkQiwcFRtCEOC78Gpt1.transcription: Mu isoko aho abacuruzi bacururiza abagura bakagura, harimo ibintu bimeze nk'amakara bacanisha harimo intebe, ameza ariho ibintu bimeze nk'amavuta bacuruza.

Uc4KOxtqHFJvlpriJhFR.transcription: Icyumba kirimo, ibicuruzwa bitandukanye, hano abantu bashobora kujya kugura, ibyo bashaka, kugura.

2ErWordcE2UDk39rCneO.transcription: Inyubako nziza, ifite urubaraza rw'umweru, ikoreramo ubucuruzi bugiye butandukanye nka telefone n'ibindi, hari n'akazu abakiriya ba banki popilere y'abaturage, bafatiramo amafaranga yabo, bakoresheje ikarita ya ATM.

5ZbyMwisQMlEpL97f2R6.transcription: Akazu ka sosiyete y'itumanaho ya MTN mu Rwanda kicayemo umu ajenti wa MTN arimo arakira abaje kumugana kugira ngo abahe serivisi zo kubitsa ndetse no kubikura.

H3meDkRWfMZFMfr5eDAy.transcription: Icyumba giteguye neza, gishyashyeho amashuka y'umweru, kiriho ikirangiti gifite amabara y'umutuku n'imisego myiza y'umweru ndetse n'inzitiramubu itamanuye n'urugi rw'icyumba rurakinze ruri mu ibara ry'umutuku.

ph3SFj6gBuDkqhBWIIzU.transcription: Ni abantu ubona ko bari ahantu mu nzu, bakaba barimo barasenga, bamwe bahagurutse bateze amaboko bisa  bari mu mwuka, abandi barunamye basa naho nabo barimo barasenga cyane, harimo abapfukamye, ndetse izi zikaba ari serivisi zikorerwa mu nsengero.

Jmyxh8ch1RgHD2Kuxbzv.transcription: Mu muhanda wa kaburimbo uciyemo umurongo ugabanyamo umuhanda mo kabiri, harimo umuntu utwaye moto ahetse undi. Yambaye inkweto zifunguye n'umupira w'amaboko maremare. Inyuma yabo hari abantu bari gusubira inyuma barenga, harimo uwambaye umupira wumukara n'undi wambaye umupira w'umweru. Impande  y'uwo muhanda hari ibiti n'andi mazu mato arimo asize amarangi y'umweru.

xqnsznpwgSIQat3gJMdR.transcription: Abantu bicaye mu nzu mberabyombi, barimo ingeri zitandukanye, abagabo ndetse n'abagore, bigaragara ko hari ikiganiro cyangwa se inama bitabiriye kandi bafite imico myiza.

LVwIjuesjLSnEE5aWnu0.transcription: Icyumba cyiza, giteguye neza, gifite amabara y'umuhondo, amadirishya yacyo arakinze, ku nkuta hariho ibyapa, intebe zipanze neza, zizengurutse ameza, ateretseho ibirahure n'amasahani atandukanye.

wQAW0hennH0pPs2mhBHQ.transcription: Abagabo babiri barimo kuganira. Umwe ni umukozi w'umuyoboro w'itumanaho airtel wo mu Rwanda, aho uyu muntu barimo kumuha serivisi zigiye zitandukanye, harimo izo kubitsa, kubikuza ndetse n'ibijyanye na serivisi z'ubujyanama ku bijyanye n'umuyoboro w'itumanaho.

Z6jVD7bE80s0xswzD4OF.transcription: Agakarito karimo igikoresho bakoresha birukana imibu mu nzu.Kaba gashushanijeho uwo muti ndetse baragafata bakagapfundura,bagakuramo uwo muti.

Nd8mfgzZ2JPgcwnvUF7i.transcription: Ibikoresho byifashishwa mu gutegura icyayi cyangwa kofi muri hoteli cyangwa resitobale, ahantu baba bagiye gufata amafunguro ya mu gitondo, bifashisha izi mashini zitegura icyayi kandi kikazishyushya.

wUhTeM1ADVMSutyeCF8Z.transcription: Ubucuruzi ni umwuga mwiza, ni umwuga ufasha abantu mu kwiteza imbere, bigafasha abaturage mu kubona ibintu twavuga nk'umwuga wo gucuruza imbuto, imboga, bifasha abaturage mu guhaha bakabona ibibatunga kandi bigafasha n'umuntu ubicuruza kubona amafaranga akabasha kwiteza imbere.

dre0m1fkbQMMUoa3wKwK.transcription: Aha turahabona ravabo, isa n'aho iri muri salo, aho bakarabira bagiya gufata amafunguro, ibumoso hakaba hari firigo.

t7BT6azJKJLkkGjTZukY.transcription: Ibigori bifite intete z'umweru, hari ibishishuye, hari n'ibidashishuye, hari ibifite imisatsi y'umukara ndetse hari n'ibifite ibiti bimanitse.

K3owdzC8g7nsWmzKISJ1.transcription: Utuzu duto twegereye umuhanda turimo udukorana na sosiyete ya Eyateri ndetse n'izindi dutangirwamo serivisi zigiye zitandukanye haba kuzicururizamo amayinite, kubitsa no kubikuza amafaranga kuri telefoni ndetse n'ibindi.

RgWNwBRs3ZW1JP1G1eJb.transcription: Abagabo ndetse n'abagore bambaye amakanzu asa umweru ndetse hazengurutseho agatambaro gasa umutuku ndetse na shokora. Inyuma yabo hari icyapa cyanditseho amagambo ari mu mabara y'umweru ndetse n'ubururu, hari n'inyubako.

Ma2iPe64GQ41dXfWeZmp.transcription: Ahantu heza, hubatse neza, hubakishije amapave, hateretse akazu keza kubakishije imbaho, hejuru karafunguye, hicayemo abantu bane barimo kuganira bizihiwe ndetse bafite ibintu binyuranye.

d1bshWkqmMOslILwpad7.transcription: Iri ni isoko ry'ubuconsho, hakaba harimo abacuruzi bagiye batandukanye. Hari umamama wikoreye ibase irimo amajage, amaterimusi ndetse afite n'ibikombe mu ntoki, hakaba n'undi mumama uhagazemo umeze nk'ushaka kugura.

PiEFOKh636yzYosAQsoo.transcription: Inyubako itanga serivisi z'ubukerarugendo mu nyubako hakaba hari icyumba kirimo ibikoresho bitandukanye birimo ameza, utubati ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga bitandukanye.

EmIshDtjZOY7Y36Gnhxf.transcription: Abacuruzi barimo gupima, umwe afite umunzani hanyuma hasi hariho umufuka ni kwa kundi bapima bajishe umufuka ku munzani hanyuma bamwe bagaterura ubundi umufuka ukerera bagahita bamenya ibiro ufite.

pPM9fY19TzZUBgs175xg.transcription: Icyumba cya hoteli bifashisha bakora inama n'ibiganiro bakaba banahicara bari kwiyakira no gukora akazi cyane akajyanye n'ako mu biro.

XFkvw6IkemHKVoDdPzYU.transcription: Ahantu hahagaze umugabo, inyuma yaho hari ibikorwaremezo haragaragara nk'aho hari imbaho, imbere y'uwo mugabo hari umuntu ufashe mikoro usa nkaho arimo amubaza amakuru ajyanye n'ibyo bikorwaremezo bihari cyangwa se ibyo bikorwa bya koperative se cyangwa iby'umuntu umwe ku giti cye bihari.

vIVRTYQyl1CNJohvGaFX.transcription: Iyi ni imwe mu nyubako ugana bakakwakirana yombi ukabasha kuharuhukira, waba ufite umunaniro ubasha kubona uburiri bwiza busashe neza ukaryama ukaruhuka ukumva uguwe neza, bakubonera n'ibyo kurya yaba ibya mugitondo, ibya sa sita ndetse n'ibya nimugoroba n'icyo kunywa.

kMwOL2EJoiT9TLLfiPCB.transcription: Inyubako nziza ifite parafo isa umweru, irimo etajeri zigiye zitandukanye, ziriho ibikoresho bitandukanye, bikozwe mu buryo buboshye.

uCVIq9AZjDNA8S4O4RBx.transcription: Umugabo wambaye akagofero k'iroza ndetse na marinete yambaye itaburiya y'umweru yikenyeje agatambaro k'iroza, imbere ye hagaze umusore wambaye ingofero n'umwenda wa gisirikare, inyuma ye hagaze umudamu wambaye ikanzu y'ubururu ndetse n'umugabo wambaye ikositimu y'umukara.

6ZxH2FbSKFpG9rrhdZPm.transcription: Ipikipiki ivuye mu ruganda iteye amarangi agaragaza na sosiyete bari kwamamariza ibatera inkunga.

jAhjQfCb5psnro663dut.transcription: Ni amacupa y'ubwoko butandukanye amaremare amagufi kandi akaba agiye afite amabara atandukanye, ndetse akaba afitemo n'inzoga zitandukanye, akaba ateretse ku mbaho z'umukara, inyuma yaho hakaba hari ibara ry'umukara.

IioCoMW7DefIfIoyQ5mP.transcription: Ibikoresho biri muri hoteli cyangwa se moteli, hagizwe n'intebe, ameza ndetse n'ibirahuri biteretse hejuru y'ameza, mu rwego rwo gufasha abaje babagana.

5rvqnWfhZfqhHVQzv8rJ.transcription: Iterambere ririhuta mu mpande zose: mu bikorwa remezo, mu buvuzi ndetse no mu burezi, hano haba amahoteli mu Gihugu cy'u Rwanda ni menshi, iyo turebye iyi ni pisine nziza ahantu heza ho kuruhukira ukaza koga mu gihe ufite ibibazo ukaruhuka, hari amazi meza asa neza kandi hari n'ikirere gisa neza, ni ahantu heza cyane.

jiBLYSr6AswH3xSBpZ8p.transcription: Akazu gato ka MTN karimo umugabo ukoreramo imbere yayo hahagaze abantu batanu baje kwaka ubufasha bw'ibijyanye no kubitsa, kubikuza ndetse no kugura amayinite.

Y6zLjJHofxJoONjW84BR.transcription: Aha ni mu isoko, bacuruje inyanya, hari abafite ibitunguru ku rutaro, hari umusilamu witadiye, hakaba n'abantu bafite intoryi ku rutaro, hakaba n'abandi bafite pavuro.

QWKLlPbNkw9hzFAAUhRv.transcription: Mu nzu y'ubucuruzi higanjemo: imifuka y'isukari, umuceri, umunyu ndetse n'ubugari, hakaba harimo isabune yo koga, amavuta yo guteka ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho bitandukanye umuntu akenera byo gukoresha.

PcGPkLz7KYPE4T02NUvU.transcription: Aho utereka amacupa y'ibinyobwa, ni kimwe mu bituma umuntu uje kubireba yumva ashaka kubinywa.

bfPZ5qxBziYsepxn1D9M.transcription: Icyumba kirimo igitanda gishashe kiriho amashuka y'umweru ndetse n'indi iri hagati y'umukara, gifite imisego ibiri, inyuma yacyo ku rukuta hasize irangi riri mu ibara ry'umweru, umukara ndetse n'umuhondo, hakurya hari irido ku idirishya ndetse n'itara ririkwaka umuhondo.

mvTGd5zvecpJuodeqITM.transcription: Amasoko agiye atandukanye akunze gucuruza ibicuruzwa bigiye binyuranyuranye aho usanga harimo inyanya ndetse n'ibindi bicuruzwa by'imboga, ibyo bigatuma ababihaha babibona ku bwinshi kandi bitabagoye mafaranga atari menshi.

7kHoyW35oTtyycg893mj.transcription: Umumotari uri kuri moto ye ahetse undi mugabo wambaye umupira wumuhondo, bose bambaye ingofero z'ubwirinzi hirya hari inyubako.

REKIwf27sL58XrfNAJNc.transcription: Iduka ricururizwamo imyambaro ndetse n'ibindi bikoresho byo mu rugo. Bakaba bacuruzamo amakanzu y'abakobwa, ibitambaro byo mu mutwe n'inzitiramibu.

UaL8RyXeBUnP4a2kUgUa.transcription: Ni umugore uri gucuruza mu iduka, iryo duka ririmo ibintu bitandukanye, harimo omo, biswi, amakaroni, ibikapa umunzani, n'amashashi, bifite amabara atandukanye umuhondo, ubururu, umutuku.

is2cmgNLgmhpJso08nvx.transcription: Abakora umwuga wo gutwara imodoka basobanura ko imirongo y'umweru bashyira mu mihanda ya kaburimbo ibafasha kwirinda impanuka za hato na hato, basobanura ko ari byiza kuko iyo bahageze babanza bagahagarara bakareba ko nta muturage ukeneye kwambuka kuko ifasha abaturage kwambuka igihe ibinyabiziga byahagaze.

5tBYASQDEyRVN6BPRztr.transcription: Ahantu ubona wagira ngo uri mu kabari, aho abantu bicara kuri izi ntebe tureba, barimo baranywa nk'inzoga cyangwa fanta cyangwa ibintu by'imitobe. Biragaragara ko izi ntebe zicaraho  abantu batatu batatu, ubona ko basangira bafitanye gahunda.

gpvcruPjmdeaG8QKl5ZJ.transcription: Inyubako ifite irangi rivanze umweru n'ubururu ndetse hakaba hanze hari ikibuga n'ahantu hari ibyatsi, inyuma y'inyubako hari ibiti bitandukanye birebire n'ibigufi.

lGHYCgV6YBxs7vIMfLdl.transcription: Icyumba kinini cyisanzuye kirimo igitanda kiriho matela ishashe neza kumashuka y'mweru ndetse n'imisego ibiri y'mweru; harimo intebe z'ubwugamiro zifite imyanya ibiri ndetse urugi rw'icyo cyumba rurafunguye.

3C3JZQr6jpU8kZJ5HOiW.transcription: Ahantu hari ameza manini ateretseho amasahani ariho ibiryo ndetse n'ibirahure birimo icyo kunywa, biragaragara ko hano hafatirwa amafunguro cyangwa se hahurira abantu bagafata amafunguro cyangwa se ibyo kurya.

xtdM5lkIBfzfv4alMTj7.transcription: Abamotari babiri umwe yicaye kuri moto undi arahagaze afashe mu mahembe ya moto ye barimo kuganira, umwe yambaye ikoti ry'umukara n'ikoboyi undi yambaye umupira w'amaboko maremare ndetse n'ipantaro imbere yabo haru umuntu uri gukurura ikigunguru ndetse n'imodoka iri kuza ibasatira.

9issGhJmoz7Q0xw5qQzB.transcription: Abaturage bahuriye hamwe barimo kuganirizwa n'umukangurambaga wabo. Afite indangururamajwi, imbere ye hariho akabati gateretseho ibyo arimo gusoma. Hari ibitambaro bitatse, biri mu mabara y'umuhondo n'icyatsi.

Dws6Z2bASD5IE7Y1JvBq.transcription: Gukorera hamwe mu matsinda ndetse no kwizigamira mu bigo by'imari biciriritse, bifasha abaturage mu kwiteza imbere binyuze mu kwizigamira ndetse no kuguza igihe bafite imishinga ibafasha mu kwiteza imbere.

twzyMZDUJsqtpeiqpH1L.transcription: Icyumba cyahuriwemo n'abagabo bambaye amakoti harimo wambaye iry'umukara n'undi wambaye iry'ubururu bose bambaye za karuvate n'amashati y'umweru, kikaba kirimo ibishushanyo bigiye bitandukanye mu mabara agiye atandukanye nk'ubururu umweru n'icyatsi hamanitsemo ifoto ya Perezida wa Repubulika y'u Rwanda.

cmvEsgC3gmCQOjnQXTdR.transcription: Sale nini cyane, yakira abantu benshi, hejuru harimo parafo n'amatara yaka neza, hicayemo abantu benshi cyane, ku ntebe zifite ibara ry'umweru, ndetse hasi hakotejwe isima.

xFD9skuo6gcoLkUzzAFg.transcription: Inzu ifite umuryango w'umukara, ifite igipangu ndetse inageretse, ni imwe mu zifasha abantu kuruhuka, ndetse no kuhafatira amafunguro haba aya mu gitondo, saa sita ndetse n'aya nimugoroba, kandi ikabafasha no mu kuganira by'umwihariko ibijyanye n'akazi.

xj0jnfvZ1xRkXh9P6Txx.transcription: Isoko riri gucururizwamo ibicuruzwa bigiye bitandukanye hari ishitingi irambuye hasi iriho imyenda ndetse n'ibindi, kandi inyuma y'iryo soko hari ibiti.

Wv1kWTVn9OTu1cCioIbv.transcription: Mu myaka yashize nibwo wasangaga abantu bakunze kugura ubu bwoko bwa sirage kugira ngo batere inkweto zabo zihore zisa neza, ariko ubu hagiye haza izindi za kizungu zino ziracika.

TR7Bl3cW6qFGQiEQSmEb.transcription: Inama yahuje abahinzi n'aborozi, umuntu ushinzwe ubuhinzi ari kubaha imbwirwaruhame ijyanye n'ubuhinzi n'ubworozi, bigendanye n'igihembwe bagezemo.

RyRErZG9SzK3RFrAbkA0.transcription: Ni abantu bicaye, imbere yabo ku meza hateretse uducupa tw'amazi, aho bicaye hari ibitambaro by'amabara atandukanye, igitare, umutuku, icyatsi.

ITPMMvTi4e4Dz1uy0qVa.transcription: Ahantu hasa neza cyane, ahantu ubona ko hiyubashye, hatangirwa serivisi z'abaza babagana, abashaka kurara bashaka amacumbi, abashaka kurya bakarira ahantu heza, aha ahantu harasa neza, hari intebe nziza, imitako myiza, amatara meza.

lNbKfF8x7eRDiAmlKaNv.transcription: Ni byiza kugira insengero dusengeramo, kuko bidufasha kwiyegereza Imana ndetse no kuyiha icyubahiro.

raUa7Szgos3V8yICQ6kY.transcription: Mote iri muri kaburimbo ihetse abantu babiri hari utwaye, hari n'uwo ahetse inyuma, iruhande rwe hari ama moto, hari amamodoka aparitse ruguru imbere y'amazu, barimo kugenda bambaye amakasika bose.

xk84O005DA7D6EvIWfoH.transcription: Uyu mupapa ari muntuza, mu mbuto z'imyembe, ubona ko ari kuzitaho kugira ngo azabone uko ajya kuzitera ahandi, aha hanga ni aho binariza imbuto zitandukanye, zihingwa.

qmwksZNcfUAw24ObPKzP.transcription: Isoko ubona ko hari abantu batandukanye, hagiye hari ibiribwa bigiye bitandukanye, hari umugabo uri gusunika igare ripakiye imifuka, itatu itandukanye ndetse hejuru hari umusego w'igare, yambaye agapira k'amaboko maremare k'ibara ry'ubururu.

P4L38djAJ0oMA4BpWp9d.transcription: Umugabo wambaye agapira k'ubururu kariho ikirango cy'Igihugu. Uwo mugabo afashe mikoro bisa naho ari kuvuga ijambo. Hirya ye inyuma ye hari ibintu bimeze nk'ibiti birebire ndetse bisa naho hari abantu ari kuganira nabo, ari kugezaho ijambo.

n6W5sYxvtVbTwm9qMgoW.transcription: Umuhanda urimo kugendaho ikinyabiziga gitwawe n'umuntu ufite umutwaro, awushyize imbere ye, hariho ingofero atwaye mu ntoki ndetse n'iyo yambaye. Ingofero imufasha kwirinda kwangirika umutwe mugihe akoze impanuka.

OHN6xKOQ8jIQNaZcRm5R.transcription: Ni umuhanda mugari wa kaburimbo, ukaba ukikijwe n'amazu yifashishwa mu bucuruzi, hakaba harimo kunyurwamo ibinyabiziga bitandukanye birimo za moto, ibi bikaba bifasha abantu mu kuva ahantu hamwe bajya ahandi mu buryo bworoshye.

DecZjJPnqG2Tk8Pg33uo.transcription: Inyubako nini cyane ikorerwamo bucuruzi aho abantu benshi bayizamo baje kwiyakira cyangwa kuruhukiramo iruhande hari n'ubusitani bwiza cyane ku buryo umuntu wese uhagannye abasha kubona serivise ashaka kandi yifuza.

wFulP1U0rI59dzejrlum.transcription: ifoto yerekana abamotari barimo baragenda mu muhanda wa kaburimbo, umuhanda ukoze umeze neza, ubona ko ari muhanda w'icyerekezo aho abantu bashobora kugenda mo bameze neza nta kibazo.

KH36Vq7q3gXgclzNJFkU.transcription: Ni intebe ziri mu mabara y'umutuku, zikaba zikikije ameza ariho ibitambaro by'umwe, izi ntebe zikaba zifashishwa n'abantu baje bagana iyi nyubako yakira abantu baje kuyakira.

L1xNnQFg2WfONmVIVLWr.transcription: Kiliziya ahantu hatagatifu abakristu bagenda bakaganira n'Imana, bakayitura ibyabo, bakayereka ababo ndetse bakanahicuriza ibyaha byabo.

PuwJzov8P1DBuvgOFK6T.transcription: Aha ni aho bafatira ibyo kurya, haba ibya saa sita, ibya nimugoroba, umuntu akabifata kugira ngo agire ubuzima bwiza kandi abashe no kumva amerewe neza, adafite inzara.

WmcEnbh5pu3LjBnCoIS2.transcription: Ipirone rirerire cyane binyuzeho insinga z'amashanyarazi zijyanye umuriro mu baturage, kugirango biteze imbere, bateze imbere n'imiryango yabo mu buryo bwo guhanga inganda nini n'iziciriritse.

tN9LOuKZiJ6wmDfozXHv.transcription: Ni abantu bose bari muri siporo bari mu kibuga, hari amatara hirya yaho, bose bari muri gimu hari abari imbere, hari abari inyuma.

CUUq4UmCn55cyzMEO9Xn.transcription: Ikibuga k'imyidagaduro cyangwa se sitade. Ahagenewe kwicara abafana, hicaye abantu hose haruzuye. Mu gihe mu kibuga hagati ahakinirwa umupira w'amaguru harimo amakipe abiri ari gukina. Ikipe imwe, yambaye imyenda y'umukara n'umweru mu gihe indi yambaye ibara ry'ubururu ariko ryerurutse. Mu kibuga kandi harimo abasifuzi bambaye imyenda y'imihondo ndetse n'imikara. Hari umwe uri hagati ndetse n'undi uri ku mpande ufite n'ibedera ry'abasifuzi.

QE98xvTvyU95yMZSeLF2.transcription: Ibintu bijyanye n'umuriro w'amashanyarazi mubiharire abantu babyigiye gusa ndetse bafitiye impamyabumenyi kuko ibi si ibintu byo gukiniramo n'urupfu rushobora kuziramo uramutse utitwararitse.

3Md8WxDZjS2ZDHd9Kjvx.transcription: Abaturage benshi bicaye ahantu n'abandi bahagaze umwe, afite mikoro arimo aravuga abandi bamuhagaze iruhande barimo barareba imbere.

dITDJSr3gL7HjGtqGfbH.transcription: Ikibuga cy'umupira w'amaguru kirimo abakinnyi bari gusuhuzanya bambaye imipira y'umutuku ndetse n'imipira y'ubururu, inyuma y'aho hari inzuzi zihubatse ndetse hakaba hari n'ibiti birebire by'inturusi.

8y37yCjL7sNyTdC69qdv.transcription: Mbere y'uko umukino w'umupira w'amaguru utangira abakinnyi bamanza gukora imyitozo mikeya ubwo bazenguruka ikibuga abandi bagasimbuka kugira ngo baze kujya mu mukino bameze neza batsinde.

hMTEa3LxmKQmsiieI8q5.transcription: Turabona parikingi y'aho baparika muri kaburimbo, aho imodoka iparika hose haba haciyemo imirongo y'umweru kugira bereke buri mushoferi aho azaparika, hari n'isoko riparitseho utumodoka hanze ndetse ni isoko rya etaje igeretse, hari ahagana ibumoso bwayo inzu y'ibirahuri gusa y'umutamenwa.

7HF1SLxGDKL4QdHNL0GS.transcription: Uyu ni umuhanda wa kaburimbo urimo uranyuramo igare ririho umuhungu mutoya, harimo kandi moto iriho umumotari uhetse umufuka inyuma.

aNN4R5w2dWEKaRhLmRsO.transcription: Mu kibuga harimo itsinda ry'abantu benshi, imbere yabo hari aho binjirira'ho basohokera, kuruhande hari aho abafana bicara hari mu mabara y'icyatsi, umuhondo n'ubururu.

XTRJfPgR7DL3eLNyL2I7.transcription: Ni byiza ko urubyiruko rw'abakobwa rugomba kugana umukino w'umupira kubera ko ari ingenzi mu buzima bwabo, ni byiza rero ko tugomba gushishikariza buri mukobwa wese akagana umukino w'umupira w'amaguru ndetse n'uw'amaboko kugira ngo abashe guhabwa ibihembo bigiye bitandukanye bizwi nk'igikombe, cyegukanwa n'umuhanga mu bintu bigiye bitandukanye, bitewe n'ibyo yakoze.

IrQI7Opgu5WK9Zz2Iz3i.transcription: Ahateraniye imbaga y'abantu benshi yivanzemo urubyiruko cyane cyane hakaba harimo igitsina gore n'igitsina gabo, basa nkaho bateranyirijwe ahantu hamwe ,mu rwego rwo kwiga kwiga ku mutekano ndetse n'amategeko areba umuntu ku giti ke.

omVQFXsEfGteOCMdNRMU.transcription: Ihema ryera rifite amabara yo mu ibedera ry'igihugu ku mpande ariyo icyatsi, umuhondo n'ubururu, muri iryo hema hicaye abantu bagiye batandukanye bitabiriye inama runaka, imbere yabo hahagaze umugabo wambaye ishati yenda kuba kaki wayitebeje mu ipantaro y'ubururu bwijimye yambaye n'impeta ku ntoki ze, ku kuboko k'ibumoso yambaye amadarubindi inyuma ye hicaye umupolisikazi.

wOq5m1gyTpctr1wOhNta.transcription: Umugore arimo aragosora ibishyimbo akoresheje intara aseka cyane, ufite n'ibibero bisa n'umukara witeze neza n'igitambaro, arimo arerekana uko bashobora kugosora bakoresheje umuyaga.

VpgdZpB6i4SyvqvYONL3.transcription: Inyamaswa nazo zirakundanaga, inkende ihetse umwana wayo, ndetse iri ahantu heza, hameze neza cyane, hafite umutekano, iragenda itembera, n'umwana gwayo gwuratuje, ubona ko ibintu byose bimeze neza.

3DGRrX08m34QEF1qnoOz.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
3DGRrX08m34QEF1qnoOz.transcription:
Abagororonome barimo barafuhirira ibigori ndetse n'amashu
  mu uburyo bugezweho bw'ikoranabuhanga, aho amazi ari guca mu itiyo.

BXAa6eAQA7qSa80iKz3V.transcription: Izi bazita tamusoni.Ufata ipanu ukazikawusha,iyo umaze kuzikawusha ufata tungurusumu,igitunguru,ugakora isosi.

sJegEba8aPDZ6kuWxBJ8.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
sJegEba8aPDZ6kuWxBJ8.transcription: Abantu bize iby'ubuhinzi babitaga abagoronome , bajaga mu giturage kwigisha uko bahingaga ibishimbo by'umushingiriro ku murongo . Barabishingiriraga , ubundi bikazatanga umusaruro gushimishije.

JrUgnRA0WF2FOF1VYHqG.transcription: Inkende zikunze kwiryamira mu biti, zigashira akaboko hanze, zikigaramira ku buryo ubona zinezerewe cane rwose. Ba mukerarugendo iyo baje kuzisura, usanga bazishimiye kandi natwe nk'abaturage bo mu Ntara y'Amajaruguru, usanga zidushimishije cane rwose.

qLH44v5qzJlbdjBWucZC.transcription: Ibishimbo iyo babisaruye mu mvura birameraga, bikamera,ukabyanika, bikamera nabi, bigasa  nabi, kubera yuko byanyagiwe, babisaruye mu mvura; cangwa n'amasaka iyo baginitse bakaganika nago gagiraga imimero.

SHkVbAOvShRsfYPLuJo4.transcription: Ibigori biri mu mufuka byarasaruwe ni ibigori byiza by'umweruru, bimeze neza byitaweho ku buryo bukwiye biragaragara ,ni ikigori gitanga umusaruro ufututse ufatika cane ni ikigori rwose kimeze neza cane.

7jOiJamp1L1mYho0GwqP.transcription: Ikiyaga ku nkengero hariho ibiti， mo  hagati hariho ikirwa giteyemo ibiti，ikirwa gituyemo n'abantu.

xSn4USSOCR8EMR3k80Vf.transcription: Ubunyobwa, kikaba igihingwa cera ahantu hakunze kuba izuba ryinshi. Ubunyobwa ni ikiriiribwa gishobora kuribwa bagitetse uko cyakabaye nyuma yo gusarurwa, kikanikwa, kigatunganywa, cyangwa se bakagisya kikava mo ifu, bakazayifashisha mu guteka.

9xUulzDMwAPWbftGwLGG.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
9xUulzDMwAPWbftGwLGG.transcription: Umuntu utamenya ko ari umukobwa cyangwa ari umuhungu kuko agaragara intoki gusa .Ufashe umufuniko urimo puwavuro utamenya umubare wazo ariko zirenga puwavuro zirindwi. Hegeyeho akabase katagaragara kose karimo intoryi ziri hasi, ariko atari ku butaka ni kuri sima. Hirya yaho hariho akantu k'akobo karimo itaka .

7wuWpxKLL5Hcq4atHQb0.transcription: Ibyo ni ibirayi byatewe bisa nk'aho bitari byera, bifite ibara ry'icyatsi barabitabiriye, barabitabiriye birabura nk'amezi abiri ngo byere, bikikijwe n'ibigori hira byeze.

gPZ8kSZsmRmpuKpJwQA6.transcription: Igihingwa cy'ubunyobwa ni  cyiza cane. Cyera cyane cyane ahantu h'utubuye, kandi  wagisanga mu ntara y'Iburasirazuba. Niho hera ubunyobwa.

sRsWc43W0BNVz38arMjG.transcription: Abagore batatu biteze ibitambaro ndetse banakenyeye ibitenge bafashe ubunyobwa. Abo, bari mu murima urimo amasaka n'ibigori ku ruhande ndetse n'ubwo bunyobwa bafashe, bakaba bishimiye umusaruro wabo.

o733Y4QPZZmlza74fScl.transcription: Ubuhinzi bw'umuceri ni ubuhinzi bukorerwa ahantu h'igishanga, hari amazi kubera ko umuceri ukenera ahantu hahehereye kugira ngo yere neza, atange umusaruro.

OrYah5a8icn7CZPICdc1.transcription: Abagore babiri bari kuyora mu mabasi ubunyobwa. Bari gukoresha amabasi ane biteze n'ibitambaro, bari kuyora biteze n'ibitenge, bari kuyora barashira mu mifuka.

7ETWYezQi16RaTq6DlJj.transcription: Ibicuruzwa biriri mu isoko biri mu mabase, impande yayo mabase hahagaze umugore ukenyeye igitenge, ibyo bicuruzwa bikaba ari ibinyampeke ari iby'ibishimbo,umuceri n'amashaza.

EPWBzWYBCEjVTm3fJAxA.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
EPWBzWYBCEjVTm3fJAxA.transcription: Umwumbati ni igihingwa giteraga umubiri gwacu imbaraga,ni na kimwe mu bihingwa bigize indyo yuzuye kandi iyo umuhinzi agihinze neza yagishizeho ifumbire kimuhaga amafaranga akihaza ,agahaza n'abaturage muri rusange.

WS1y7ABsDg8dHCEr1aOE.transcription: Imiteja ni bimwe mu bishimbo bihingwaga cane cane mu Ntara y'Amajaruguru ku buryo usanga abantu b'abakire ari byo bigurira aho kugura ibishimbo byumye. Bityo tukaba dusabwa guhinga byinshi kugira ngo tubashe guhaza amasoko kuko bibonekamo cane cane n'intungamubiri zubaka umubiri mu buryo bwihuse.

DOZSbYV8CUMz4K7E6IYA.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
DOZSbYV8CUMz4K7E6IYA.transcription: Inanasi ni urubuto rusigaye rukundwa n'abanyarwanda,  iyo inanasi zeze barazica bakajya kuzigurisha, inanasi zeze neza usanga zihishije iyo uzitegereje ziba ziryoheye amaso.

GnO8BtmEMShG4UxcGgDc.transcription: Guno ni umuhanda gw'abaturage, guteyeho igiti. Icyo giti gitangaga umusaruro, abaturage bakabona amafaranga go gukoresha.

2hhqubhW6dKYcKmqlcmn.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
2hhqubhW6dKYcKmqlcmn.transcription: Isoko bari gucururizamo inyanya, bagacururizamo imyembe, bagacururizamo amafu gagiye gatandukanye, bagacururizamo amavuta, bagacururizamo amapavuro, harimo n'imitaka za emutiyeni.

I4i9OZ2uig2cdhx5u3em.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
I4i9OZ2uig2cdhx5u3em.transcription: Inyanya ni ibihingwa bahingaga mu ntara y'amajyaruguru. Ni ibihingwa biba bifite akamaro kenshi, kuko bazivangaga n'ibiryo bikaziryosha, kandi ziba zifite n'intungamubiri zihagije. Abana bakunda kuzihekenya, ndetse n'abantu bakuru barazihekenyaga.

sppwKyaMjm5Xnx2kPto1.transcription: Ubunyobwa igihingwa cerera hasi mu butaka kigakurwa nk'ibirayi gishobora kwifashishwa mu gihe co guteka cangwa kikaribwa gikaranze ari kibisi, ni ikiribwa ciza kigira intungamubiri nyinshi zishobora kugufasha cane cane ku bagabo.

jTa0V1t5breJiCEnbAwG.transcription: Ihene zibikanda ziri ku ncumagira zizitse ku majosi ziri mu kiraro gikikijwe n'ibiti by'intusi byumye,zimwe zishamye izindi zihagaze ziri kurisha utwatsi duke hasi.

AEGKaf7h4XU3zjC1LVGh.transcription: Abahinzi iyo bejeje umusaruro gwabo gw'ibigori. Bakagushira mu buhunikero rusange bituma ugo musaruro gumera neza, ntigubashe kwangirika kuko guba guri ahantu hizewe, hatwikiriye kandi hageraga  n'akazuba.

GzvMlMki6CNIfuvIK4XS.transcription: Inka y'umutavu ni ngombwa kugira ngo bayiteho, bayitere inshinge n'ibinini bya vitamine, kugira ngo izazamuke imeze neza, ikure ifite ubuzima bwiza buzira umuze.

YQCY0m28E4gJhkE2cMLB.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
YQCY0m28E4gJhkE2cMLB.transcription: Imifuka z'ibirayi basaruye mu murima， bazirunda ahantu hamwe，ntago bari bafunga izo mifuka baracategereje ngo bazifunge neza， babijane kubigurisha ku masoko.   Ibirayi biraryohaga cane，turabikundaga kandi n'iwacu biraheraga.

779tW87ch60pNawSgJmX.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
779tW87ch60pNawSgJmX.transcription: Amatunda agira intungamubiri nyinshi hari amatunda y'umukara abahinzi bakunze guhinga cyane, ayo matunda iyo bayasaruye amaze guhisha ubona ateye amabengeza, ayo matunda agira umutobe uryoshye, kandi agira intungamubiri nyinshi.

YEYT2JjO4T4lx29GHT8I.transcription: Umurima guteyemo ibirayi，inyuma yaho hariho itsinda ry'ibitoki ndetse n'igipangu kiriho ibishayote byegereye inzu ya karabasasu， ibi bikaba ari ibihingwa bikundaga gucuruzwa mu masoko gagiye gatandukanye.

1hsFD2cJ0FKy3c3ZnkaH.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
1hsFD2cJ0FKy3c3ZnkaH.transcription: Ivoka zikunze kuba zifite ubuheri akenshi ziba ari imbangurirano, izi voka zikaryoha cyane,kandi izi voka zishobora kuvamo amavuta ndetse zikaba zavamo n'ubuto.

60gEPPV2ihYuT6g5Sisp.transcription: Umugabo urimo gutera umuti inyanya, afashe icuma mu mugongo arimo aratera umuti. Ubu bukaba ari  uburyo bukoreshwa mu kwirinda ibyonnyi byose bishobora guhungabanya imyaka. Ubu bakaba babitera mu myaka kugira ngo imyaka ikomeze ikure ifite ubuziranenge n'ubudahangarwa.

O62btf2L9NejQsJx21dB.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
O62btf2L9NejQsJx21dB.transcription: Ibigori.Kikaba kimwe mu bihingwa byera cane mu Rwanda,kikaba ndetse igihingwa kihanganira ubushuhe n'imvura biringaniye .Ibigori bikunze kwera cyane ahantu hataba izuba ryinshi ndetse hataba n'imvura nyinshi.Ibigori bivamo impungure babirya babirya ari impungure bakabirya babisheshemo ifu y'igikoma.

3UOvN0ylDCIifA0g2mXa.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
3UOvN0ylDCIifA0g2mXa.transcription: Umurima guhinzemo imyaka ziri ku murongo gumwe zishinzeho ibiti bifataga iriya myaka umuntu uri gukorera iriya myaka wambaye agapira k'ubururu wambaye n'inkweto za bodaboda zirimo ibara ry'umutuku.

u9m5SFX7qeVJigm6oXfG.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
u9m5SFX7qeVJigm6oXfG.transcription: Aba bantu bari gusoroma amababi gavamo icyayi bayashyira mu dutebo. Ikindi kandi icyayi ku bantu bagihinga gitangaga amafaranga menshi.

8dBuTzVsi73UIZ0kFPCK.transcription: Abagabo yafashe inka kugira ngo babone uko bayiha ubuvuzi, mo barasuzuma uburwayi yaba afite. Ku kuyifata kugira ngo itazagutera amahane, niba uhabwe ubuvuzi.

VMdHU5C1hxrGMkMpK0M6.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
VMdHU5C1hxrGMkMpK0M6.transcription: Ibi bihingwa barabicuruzaga. Babicuruzaga mu isoko harimo ibinyomoro, amaronji, watameroni n'imyembe. Byose barabicuruzaga.

4Qg5QTQsm3GiEcX18Ze1.transcription: Ni umurima guhinzwemo soya. Gumwe guhinzwemo soya imaze gupfundura, ifite amababi menshi mu mutabo gumwe indi harimo itariyapfundura neza bikikijwe n'iindi myaka itandukanye harimo n'ibiko bishinze.

rzbYLF6A99NAEqmsGUYr.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
rzbYLF6A99NAEqmsGUYr.transcription: Amatunda n'imbuto nziza cane yera ahantu ho mu misozi nka burera na gakenke. Amatunda umutobe wawo ni ingirakamaro nko kwa sina kuri Nyirangarama barawukoresha cane kandi amatunda atuma abana bagira apeti ubwo ku bana batoya amatunda ni meza cane.

XfuHY5v1cJmcT99uFDzB.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
XfuHY5v1cJmcT99uFDzB.transcription: Ubwandiko bw'imyumbati ni ubwaniko bugomba kuba bufite isuku, cane cane ko butuma imyumbati iba ifite isuku  kandi ikifashishwa mu biribwa.

A6gFEDPXQ3tZrKlrGYdH.transcription: Iyo twahinze tukeza tugasarura imyaka yacu tuyikoreraga isuku, turayigosoraga,tukayijana ku isoko,  bakaduha amafaranga,tukaguramo ibindi byo ku kurya, kubera y'uko tubaga twejeje byinshi tukaryamo tugasagurira n'isoko.

H3UdXKb57yKj3mFOKSRy.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
H3UdXKb57yKj3mFOKSRy.transcription: iyo ugiye ku isoko uhasanga abantu bagiye batandukanye bamwe bazanye intama abandi ihene baje kugurisha ukahasanga n'abandi baje kugura bamwe bagiye korora abandi bagiye kuzibaga ngo bavanemo inyama.

RuDQeHC8I5SEW7Y1evNe.transcription: Inka ziri kurisha mu rwuri rwazo hafi y'ibiti ,hafi y'igitari zikaba ari inka nyinshi ariko zitari nyinshi cane.

N9k7qXQg8DKpliOiQPXp.transcription: Ingano zimeze neza cane, tugiraga ubwoko bw'ingano butandukanye:tugiraga ingano z'umusururu,n'ingano z'umutsima,hano tubona ingano z'umusururu ziba ari ndende, ingano z'umutsima zibaga ari ngufiya.

bCBOWRtXRUqmhtC3PwgX.transcription: Ifi yokeje iraryoha. Ifi iriho inyanya, sereri, yatetswe mu amavuta, iba imeze neza cyane.

xuH9fX4LzcizSbJJY8S7.transcription: Abaganga bane, abirabura babiri ndetse n'abazungu babiri bambaye ingofero, ubupfukamunwa na apuroni, bari mo barita ku murwayi umerewe nabi cyane bamubaga.

gQnv5YOJ4WtVjIZbBoPu.transcription: Aha ndi kubonaho ibinyamisogwe by'ubwoko butatu. Hariho imiteja, ibitonore, imiteja n'ibitonore. Hariho ibisa n'umutuku n'ubururu ibindi bikajya gusa n'umuhondo ibindi n'umukara.  Ni ibishyimbo muri make.

o7FXxkfLeSqYLkoSnM9Y.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
o7FXxkfLeSqYLkoSnM9Y.transcription: Inyanya iyo zahinzwe neza, zigakurikiranwa neza, barasaruraga bakavanamo umusaruro mwinshi. Ugwo musaruro gw'izo nyanya bakagujana ku isoko, bakazigurisha kugira ngo babone agandi mafaranga gwo gukoresha ibindi bintu.

MV3es458F39BobrLnA7t.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
MV3es458F39BobrLnA7t.transcription: Muri iyi minsi hari ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'abantu b'abahanga, ku buryo batera ibirayi mu nzu zabugenewe zitwa gilini hawuzi, abantu iyo bazigiyemo rero usanga babona ibirayi byiza bimeze neza by'ingemwe, ku buryo babihinga rimwe na rimwe mu mirima yo hafi y'amago, cangwa se nko kuri za motimbiri kandi bikera neza.

1THv0a1os2rHd7Tl0GZS.transcription: Akanyamasyo kagira urukonoshwa rugitwikiriye rubaga rukomeye, gafite ibyana bwinshi buri no mu byatsi bw'icyatsi, kabaranyanyagiye cane, butegereje ko nyina iva mu gikonoshwa ikabwitaho.

y3AWpjLyA4etlFgEgpqj.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
y3AWpjLyA4etlFgEgpqj.transcription: Nkurikije uko ikirere kimeze ndabona ikirere gikeye,uyu muntu yabonye umuco ahinga neza ibi birayi n'iyo bitaba ibirayi, ibindi byose yaba agiye guhinga bizere neza kuko ubutaka buhinze mu gihe c'izuba.

0Y9bUW4UmqnLABFfnk3n.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
0Y9bUW4UmqnLABFfnk3n.transcription: Voka y'imbangurire igiraga akabuto gatoya cane. Imbere ibaga isa n'umuhondo. Inyuma utari wayisatura ibaga ifite ibiheri. Igiraga amavuta na vitamine.

m9Dg1fAfHiHbrh1AZO0v.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
m9Dg1fAfHiHbrh1AZO0v.transcription: Ubworozi bw'inka butangaga umusaruro mwinshi cyane, tuzijanaga ku isoko tukazigurisha bakaduhamo amafaranga. Kandi iyo tuzoroye turazigaburiraga, zigatanga umusaruro, urugero nk'iyo yabyaye iduhaga amata tukayanywa, tukayajana ku isoko bakaduhamo amafaranga, tugahahamo ibindi bikoresho dukeneye, tukayaguramo n'ibyo kurya.

viQiGbBAWyB20M9K7P7z.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
viQiGbBAWyB20M9K7P7z.transcription: Ibigori barabiryaga, barabihingaga byakwera bakabisarura, baranabirya. Babijyagamo akawunga, cyangwa bakabinywamo igikoma. Ibigori.

hTPjPdnOhbdw708VbmLk.transcription: Imbuto z'ubwoko butandukanye, izirimo zimwe zifite amabara y'icatsi, izindi amabara g'umuhondo, izindi amabara g'umutuku, hariho n'agatanda izo mbuto zitetsemo.

fqZLUmieuz4AGWhc7sbh.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
fqZLUmieuz4AGWhc7sbh.transcription: Muri gare, impande ya gare ya Musanze, mu isoko ry’imboga n’imbuto, ahacururizwa karoti, amaronji, ibishufureri, amashu, inyanya n’ibitunguru by’umweru n’iby’umutuku, biri gucuruzwa, n’amashaza, biri gucuruzwa mu isoko rya.

nWOVgB96Gt48KbHYrLFy.transcription: Amatungo magufi gatangaga umusaruro mwiza cane iyo umworozi wago agitayeho; muri ago matungo harimo:inkoko, n'ihene ,n'intama bisaba kugitaho kugira ngo uzagabonemo umusaruro.

85QJkH00yhQwEHtVZTr3.transcription: Iyi ni imisambi ibiri iri mu bwatsi bwiza busa n'icatsi,ihagaze iri kurebana. Iri ahantu heza cane hasa neza.

B55rIBMfuzljU39XGNHp.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
B55rIBMfuzljU39XGNHp.transcription: Ibijumba iyo bihinze mu butaka byereraga nk' amezi atatu cangwa ane, bitewe n'imbuto iyo ariyo ibijumba ku bihinga bituma twihaza mubiribwa no kurya ibyongera ibitera imbaraga tukaja no kubigurisha, tukabona amafaranga yo kwiteza imbere tukagura ibindi dukeneye.

Iu55lK78ziPjXWUEIh8Q.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
Iu55lK78ziPjXWUEIh8Q.transcription: Amashu mu murima ateye ku kumuronko，baraguhiraga kugira ngo kagumye gatohe bakagasukira n'amazi.

x0adjQM0Hgf37ZYAN54q.transcription: Igisiga citwa agaca kirya inkoko n'izindi nyamaswa ziguruka. Urugero nk'inyoni gishobora kuba cayifata kikayirya mu gihe kiyibonye.

KqL0955y08oJaQtwiLNS.image_sub_category: Food Banks & Food Crops and Farmers
KqL0955y08oJaQtwiLNS.transcription: Igihingwa c'inyanya iyo bazishingiriye zireraga cane . Ikikubwira ga ko zeze zibaga ari umutuku, izitarera zibaga ari icyatsi kibisi ziterwaga umuti wo kwica udukoko.

QhanC3cwIv5k6R7UGJbN.transcription: Abasuderi bari gusudira idirisha, urugi bafite ibikoresho bijyanye n'akazi bakoraga.

193sq5pcmtvzyE2oq87H.transcription: Atoriye nini cyane ifite abakozi barimo barakora imashini zapfuye, abandi barimo barareba kuri televiziyo imashini zo kwambara zishobora kuba zangiritse mu mugoroba washize, umwe yambaye inkweto isa n'igitaka.

33rrxAqn9GI8D8Ti1nOG.transcription: Umunyeshuri wiga mu mashuri yisumbuye yashushanyije intore ibyina yishimye imeze neza, yandikaho n'izina ry'iyo ntore. Ni byiza cane kuba dukurikirana amasomo go bize neza kugira ngo bamenye ibyo bashaka gukora ibyari byo mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi.

3R30N4IHRmlnP9290c9B.transcription: Abanyeshuri bakurikiranye neza cane uko umwarimu wabo aberekera ,bafite impapuro n'amakaramu ashushanya ,bariho baritegereza neza ishusho umwarimu wabo arimo abashushanyiriza.

cve0PoDuvzli6g1B6xwq.transcription: Abafundi bari mu kigo cy'amashuri bari gutondeka ibyuma bashaka kubihuza. Ni abafundi batandukanye bamwe bambaye ingofero kandi bose bambaye imyenda isa n'ubururu n'inkweto zifunze.

YYJUqw6vDgd6KYqvRhlK.transcription: Abanyeshuri bigaga gusudira, aho babaga bambaye ibisurubeti bibaranga n'ibindi bintu bapfutse mu maso, kugirango batangirika uruhu rwabo, mu gihe bari gusudira ibikoresho bitandukanye mu mashuri gabo.

aNOpcgoSEJSGnI6f1aqa.transcription: Itsinda ry'abanyeshuri bigana cyangwa se bafite icyo bahuriyeho, akenshi abanyeshuri bafite icyo bahuriyeho babahuriye ku nifomo cyangwa se ibyo biga urugero;Aabanyeshuri biga ibijanye n'ubukerarugendo ndetse no gukora mu mahoteli baba bafite inifomu zisa n'icyatsi.

76a7jg9Nm546LoKTHODB.transcription: Nk'uko bigaragara,aba ni abanyeshuri,bari kumwe n'uri kubigisha ,biragaragara ko bari kwiga, ibintu bijyanye n'ibinyabutabire.
